<div topic="Decerebrate" level="5"><p><h5>Decerebrate</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation [Teleportation]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 7<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./level)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One living creature<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Fortitude negates<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>13<br/></td></tr></table><p>With <i>decerebrate</i>,  you selectively remove a portion of the subject's brain stem. The creature loses all cerebral function, vision, hearing, and other sensory abilities, and all voluntary motor activity. The subject becomes limp and unresponsive. Without extreme measures, such as <i>greater restoration</i> or some other suitable effect of 7th level or higher, the creature perishes in 1d4 days.</p><p/>
</div>

name: D&#xE9;J&#xE0; Vu
short_description: Your target repeats his last action.
description: <p>Your mental impulse forces the subject to repeat the actions it took on its previous turn. If the situation has changed in such a way that the subject can't take the same actions again (if its foe is dead, or the subject has run out of power points, and so on), the subject stands still and takes no actions for 1 round. In any event, the subject can still defend itself, and it retains its Dexterity bonus to AC even if it stands still.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Demoralize
short_description: Enemies become shaken.
description: <p>You fill your enemies with self-doubt. Any enemy in the area that fails its save becomes shaken for the duration of the power. Allies and creatures without an Intelligence score are unaffected.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's range and the radius of its area both increase by 5 feet, and the power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Destiny Dissonance
short_description: Null
description:
<p>Your mere touch grants your foe an imperfect, unfocused glimpse of the many possible futures in store. Unaccustomed to and unable to process the information, the subject becomes sickened for 1 round per level of the manifester.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Destiny Dissonance" level="5"><p><h5>Destiny Dissonance</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Seer 1<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material and mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>Creature touched<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round/level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>1<br/></td></tr></table><p>Your mere touch grants your foe an imperfect, unfocused glimpse of the many possible futures in store. Unaccustomed to and unable to process the information, the subject becomes sickened for 1 round per level of the manifester.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Detect Hostile Intent
short_description: You can detect hostile creatures within 30 ft. of you.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Detect Hostile Intent" level="5"><p><h5>Detect Hostile Intent</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 2, psychic warrior 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Olfactory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>30 ft.<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Area:</b><br/></td><td>30-ft. -radius emanation centered on you<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>3<br/></td></tr></table><p>While the duration of this power lasts, you become aware of the presence of any creatures with hostile intent within 30 feet of you, and their direction from you (but not their specific location). The power detects active aggression, as opposed to vigilance. In addition, while this power is active you cannot be surprised or caught flat-footed by creatures that are susceptible to mind-affecting powers.</p><p>While under the effect of this power, you can make Sense Motive checks as a free action against anyone within 30 feet of you.</p><p>The power can penetrate barriers, but 3 feet of stone, 3 inches of common metal, 1 inch of lead, or 6 feet of wood or dirt blocks it.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Detect Psionics
short_description: You detect the presence of psionics.
augment: Null

name: Detect Remote Viewing
short_description: You know when others spy on you remotely.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Detect Remote Viewing" level="5"><p><h5>Detect Remote Viewing</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>40 ft.<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Area:</b><br/></td><td>40-ft. -radius emanation centered on you<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>24 hours<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>You immediately become aware of any attempt to observe you by means of a clairsentience (scrying) power or divination (scrying) spell. The power's effect radiates from you and moves as you move. You know the location of every psionic or magical sensor within the power's area.</p><p>If the viewing attempt originates within the area, you also know the viewer's location. Otherwise, you and the remote viewer immediately make opposed manifester level checks (1d20 + manifester level, or viewer's caster level as appropriate). If you at least match the remote viewer's result, you get a visual image of the remote viewer and an accurate sense of the remote viewer's direction and distance from you.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Detect Teleportation
short_description: Know when teleportation powers are used in close range.2Dimension Swap: You and ally or two allies switch positions.
description: <p>You sense the use of any effects of the teleportation subdiscipline within the area. You sense the use of these powers whether or not you have line of sight or line of effect (although a force effect prevents this detection). When you sense the use of an appropriate power, you know the direction in which the power was used, though not the distance or the exact effect.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> If you spend 2 additional power points, this power's range increases to Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level).</p><p/>

name: Dimension Door, Psionic
target: You and touched objects or other touched willing creatures
short_description: Teleports you short distance.
description: <p>As the <i>dimension door</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> If you spend 6 additional power points, you can manifest this power as a move action.</p><p/>

name: Dimension Slide
short_description: Teleports you very short distance.
description:
<p>You instantly transfer yourself from your current location to any other spot within range to which you have line of sight. You can bring along possessions that amount to as much as a medium load, including living creatures that weigh as much as 20 pounds. Movement caused by the use of <i>dimension slide</i> does not provoke attacks of opportunity.</p>
      <p>If you somehow attempt to transfer yourself to a location occupied by a solid body or a location you can't see the power simply fails to function.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> If you spend 4 additional power points, you can manifest this power as a move action.</p><p/>

name: Dimension Swap
target: You and one ally in range, or any two allies in range; see text
short_description: You and an ally switch positions.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power can affect a target one size category larger.</p><p/>

name: Dimensional Anchor, Psionic
short_description: Null
description:
<p>As the <i>dimensional anchor</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Dimensional Anchor, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Dimensional Anchor, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Nomad 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Effect:</b><br/></td><td>Ray<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes (object)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>dimensional anchor</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Disable
short_description: Subjects incorrectly believe they are disabled.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's range increases by 5 feet and its save DC increases by 1.</p><p>In addition, for every additional power point you spend to increase the range and the save DC, this power can affect targets that have Hit Dice equal to 4 + the number of additional points.</p><p/>

name: Disintegrate, Psionic
short_description: Turn one creature or object to dust.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, the damage this power deals to a subject that fails its saving throw increases by 2d6 points. Augmenting this power does not change the amount of damage the target takes if it succeeds on its saving throw.</p><p/>

name: Dismissal, Psionic
short_description: Forces a creature to return to its native plane.
description:
<p>As the <i>dismissal</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Dismissal, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Dismissal, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Nomad 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One extraplanar creature<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>dismissal</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Dismiss Ectoplasm
short_description: Dissipates ectoplasmic targets and effects.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Dismiss Ectoplasm" level="5"><p><h5>Dismiss Ectoplasm</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 3<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Area:</b><br/></td><td>30-ft. -radius burst<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>5<br/></td></tr></table><p>You dismiss creatures, objects, or effects composed of ectoplasm, such as astral constructs or the <i>ectoplasmic cocoon</i> power, or that were formerly composed of ectoplasm, such as items created by metacreativity (creation) powers.</p><p>An ectoplasmic creature that fails its Will saving throw dissipates into so much constituent ectoplasm, which evaporates immediately.</p><p>A creature under the effect of the <i>ectoplasmic form</i> power that fails its saving throw is either destroyed out right or physically shifted to a random location on the Astral Plane (50% chance for either result).</p><p>Other ongoing powers that create ectoplasmic objects or effects, such as <i>ectoplasmic cocoon</i>,  are dismissed if you succeed on a manifester level check (1d20 + your manifester level, maximum +10) against a DC of 11 + the power's manifester level.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Dispel Psionics
target: One manifester, creature, or object; or 20-ft. -radius burst
area: One manifester, creature, or object; or 20-ft. -radius burst
short_description: Cancels psionic powers and effects.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, the bonus on your dispel check increases by 2 (to a maximum bonus of +20 for a 5-point expenditure).</p><p/>

name: Dispelling Buffer
range: Personal or close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels); see text
target: You or one willing creature or one object (object weighing up to 100 lb./level); see text
short_description: You are buffered from one dispel psionics effect.
augment: Null

name: Dissipating Touch
short_description: Touch deals 1d6 damage.
description: <p>Your mere touch can disperse the surface material of a foe or object, sending a tiny portion of it far away. This effect is disruptive; thus, your successful melee touch attack deals 1d6 points of damage.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by 1d6 points.</p><p/>

name: Dissolving Touch
short_description: Your touch deals 4d6 acid damage.
description: <p>Your touch, claw, or bite is corrosive, and sizzling moisture visibly oozes from your natural weapon or hand. You deal 4d6 points of acid damage to any creature or object you touch with your successful melee touch attack. Acid you secrete denatures 1 round after use, losing all efficacy and ability to deal damage. You are immune to your own acid.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's damage increases by 1d6 points.</p><p/>

name: Dissolving Weapon
short_description: Your weapon deals 4d6 acid damage.
description:
<p>As <i>dissolving touch</i>, except your weapon is charged with acid until you make a successful attack.</p>
      <p/>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's damage increases by 1d6 points.</p><p/>
full_text:
<div topic="Dissolving Weapon" level="5"><p><h5>Dissolving Weapon</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism [Acid]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psychic warrior 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One held weapon; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>3<br/></td></tr></table><p>As <i>dissolving touch</i>, except your weapon is charged with acid until you make a successful attack.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Distract
short_description: Subject gets -4 on Listen, Search, Sense Motive, and Spot checks.
description:
<p>You cause your subject's mind to wander, distracting her. Subjects under the effect of <i>distract</i> make all Listen, Spot, Search, and Sense Motive checks at a -4 penalty.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Distract" level="5"><p><h5>Distract</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 1, psychic warrior 1<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One creature<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Concentration, up to 1 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>1<br/></td></tr></table><p>You cause your subject's mind to wander, distracting her. Subjects under the effect of <i>distract</i> make all Listen, Spot, Search, and Sense Motive checks at a -4 penalty.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Divert Teleport
area: A circle, centered on you, with a radius of 50 ft. + 10 ft./level
effect: Diverts the teleportation of any object or creature whose weight does not exceed your maximum load
short_description: Choose destination for another's teleport.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Divert Teleport" level="5"><p><h5>Divert Teleport</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation (Teleportation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 7<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 immediate action; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Area:</b><br/></td><td>A circle, centered on you, with a radius of 50 ft. + 10 ft./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Effect:</b><br/></td><td>Diverts the teleportation of any object or creature whose weight does not exceed your maximum load<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates (foils diversion)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes (foils diversion)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>13<br/></td></tr></table><p>Similar to <i>detect teleportation</i>, except that you know the intended destination, and you can divert the final destination of any teleportation attempt made by others within the area. This is an immediate action, like manifesting a quickened power, and counts toward the limit of one quickened power per round. You can manifest this power even if it is not your turn.</p><p>You can divert the destination of both incoming and outgoing teleportations, psionic and magical. You must overcome the power resistance of creatures that possess it to make a successful diversion, and the teleporting creature can make a Will save to foil the diversion as well.</p><p>For the purpose of this power, 'divert' means you choose the actual destination of any teleportation attempt you can affect, as if you yourself were teleporting to that location, regardless of the teleportation range of the effect you are diverting. The destination you choose must be a location with which you are very familiar or that you have studied carefully.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Divination, Psionic
short_description: Provides useful advice for specific proposed action.
description:
<p>As the <i>divination</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Divination, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Divination, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>10 minutes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>divination</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Dominate, Psionic
short_description: Control target telepathically.
description: <p>As the <i>dominate person</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or more of the following ways.</p><p>1. If you spend 2 additional power points, this power can also affect an animal, fey, giant, magical beast, or monstrous humanoid.</p><p>2. If you spend 4 additional power points, this power can also affect an aberration, dragon, elemental, or outsider in addition to the creature types mentioned above.</p><p>3. For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power can affect an additional target. Any additional target cannot be more than 15 feet from another target of the power.</p><p>4. If you spend 1 additional power point, this power's duration is 1 hour rather than concentration. If you spend 2 additional power points, this power's duration is 1 day rather than concentration. If you spend 4 additional power points, this power's duration is 1 day per manifester level rather than concentration.</p><p>In addition, for every 2 additional power points you spend to achieve any of these effects, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Dream Travel
target: You and touched creature or creatures (up to one/level)
short_description: Null
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Duodimensional Claw
short_description: Increases your natural weapon's threat range.
description:
<p>If you have a claw attack (either from an actual natural weapon or from an effect such as <i>claws of the beast</i>), you can use this power to improve that weapon. One of your claws becomes two-dimensional, making it razorsharp. The weapon is now psionically keen, increasing its threat range from 20 to 19-20. This benefit does not stack with other effects that improve a weapon's threat range.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Duodimensional Claw" level="5"><p><h5>Duodimensional Claw</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psychic warrior 3<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>5<br/></td></tr></table><p>If you have a claw attack (either from an actual natural weapon or from an effect such as <i>claws of the beast</i>), you can use this power to improve that weapon. One of your claws becomes two-dimensional, making it razorsharp. The weapon is now psionically keen, increasing its threat range from 20 to 19-20. This benefit does not stack with other effects that improve a weapon's threat range.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Ecto Protection
short_description: An astral construct gains bonus against dismiss ectoplasm.
description: <p>This power reinforces an astral construct created by the <i>astral construct</i> power, giving you a +1 bonus on any manifester level checks you make to protect it against <i>Dispel psionics</i> or a similar effect, and a +1 bonus on its saving throw to resist <i>dismiss ectoplasm</i>. This power can be manifested as a swift action in the same round that you manifest an astral construct, as long as the power points you spend to perform both actions does not exceed your manifester level.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, your bonus on manifester level checks to protect your astral construct increases by 1, and your astral construct's bonus on its saving throw to resist <i>dismiss ectoplasm</i> increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Ectoplasmic Cocoon
short_description: You encapsulate a foe so it can't move.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p>2. For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power can affect a target one size category larger.</p><p/>

name: Ectoplasmic Cocoon, Mass
short_description: You encapsulate all foes in a 20-ft. radius.
description: <p>As <i>ectoplasmic cocoon</i>, except you can cocoon several creatures (or a single big creature that fits in a 20-footradius sphere or hemisphere) in a mass of writhing ectoplasm. Targets entirely within the area who fail their save are caught and cocooned. If a creature's body is only partially within the area, this power does not affect that creature.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, the radius of this power's area increases by 5 feet.</p><p/>

name: Ectoplasmic Form
short_description: You gain benefits of being insubstantial and can fly slowly.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Ectoplasmic Form" level="5"><p><h5>Ectoplasmic Form</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Egoist 3, psychic warrior 3<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Olfactory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>5<br/></td></tr></table><p>You and all your gear become a partially translucent mass of rippling ectoplasm that generally conforms to your normal shape. You gain damage reduction 10/psionics, and you gain immunity to poison and critical hits. Your material armor becomes meaningless, although your size, Dexterity, deflection bonuses, and armor bonuses from force effects (such as those gained by <i>inertial armor</i>) still apply to your Armor Class.</p><p>You can manifest powers while in <i>ectoplasmic form</i>, but you must make a Concentration check (DC 20 + power level) for each power you attempt to manifest.</p><p>You cannot physically attack, you lose supernatural abilities (if any), and you can't speak while in <i>ectoplasmic form</i>. You can't run, but you can fly at a speed of 20 feet (perfect). You can pass through small holes or narrow openings, even mere cracks, with all you were wearing or holding in your hands. You are subject to the effects of wind, and you can't enter water or other liquid. You also can't manipulate objects or activate items, even those carried along with you. Continuously active items remain active, though in some cases their effects may be moot (such as items that provide armor or natural armor bonuses).</p><p/>
</div>

name: Ectoplasmic Shambler
display: Auditory, material, and olfactory; see text
effect: One ectoplasmic manifestation of a size equal to ten 10-ft. cubes (S)
short_description: Foglike predator deals 1 point of damage/two levels each round to an area.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Ectoplasmic Shambler" level="5"><p><h5>Ectoplasmic Shambler</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity (Creation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 5<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory, material, and olfactory; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 round<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Effect:</b><br/></td><td>One ectoplasmic manifestation of a size equal to ten 10-ft. cubes (S)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>9<br/></td></tr></table><p>You fashion an ephemeral, manylegged mass of pseudo-living ectoplasm called an ectoplasmic shambler. You can direct the shambler as a free action. It has a speed of 10 feet. It can completely surround objects (and opponents) over which it is manifested or onto which it moves, because it has the consistency of thick mist. The vision of those within the shambler is limited to 5 feet, and manifesting powers (or casting spells) within the shambler is difficult due to the constant turbulence felt by those caught in the shambler's form.</p><p>Creatures enveloped by the shambler, regardless of Armor Class, take 1 point of damage for every two manifester levels you have in each round they become or remain within the roiling turbulence of the shambler. Anyone trying to manifest a power must make a Concentration check (DC 15 + power's or spell's level) to successfully manifest a power or cast a spell inside the shambler.</p><p>A wind stronger than 20 miles per hour that blows against the shambler reduces its speed to 0 feet during the first round, and in subsequent rounds moves it in the direction of the wind at a speed of 5 feet. A wind stronger than 20 miles per hour that blows in the direction the shambler travels increases its speed to 15 feet.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Ego Whip
short_description: Deal 1d4 Cha damage and daze for 1 round.
description: <p>Your rapid mental lashings assault the ego of your enemy, debilitating its confidence. The target takes 1d4 points of Charisma damage, or half that amount (minimum 1 point) on a successful save. A target that fails its save is also dazed for 1 round.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 4 additional power points you spend, this power's Charisma damage increases by 1d4 points and its save DC increases by 2.</p><p/>

name: Elfsight
short_description: Gain low-light vision, +2 bonus on Search and Spot checks, and notice secret doors.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Elfsight" level="5"><p><h5>Elfsight</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 2, psychic warrior 1<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 hour/level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 3, psychic warrior 1<br/></td></tr></table><p>You gain low-light vision (as an elf ) for the duration of the power, as well as a +2 bonus on Search and Spot checks.</p><p>In addition, you gain the ability to notice secret or concealed doors by merely passing within 5 feet of one, getting to make a Search check as if you were actively looking for it.</p><p>If <i>elfsight</i> is used in conjunction with <i>my light</i>, the cone of light extends out to 40 feet instead of 20 feet.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Empathic Feedback
short_description: When you are hit in melee, your attacker takes damage.
description: <p>You empathically share your pain and suffering with your attacker. Each time a creature strikes you in melee, it takes damage equal to the amount it dealt to you or 5 points, whichever is less. This damage is empathic in nature, so powers and abilities the attacker may have such as damage reduction and regeneration do not lessen or change this damage. The damage from <i>empathic feedback</i> has no type, so even if you took fire damage from a creature that has immunity to fire, <i>empathic feedback</i> will damage your attacker.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage potential increases by 1 point.</p><p/>

name: Empathic Transfer
short_description: Transfer another's wounds to yourself.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, you can heal an additional 2d10 points of damage (to a maximum of 10d10 points per manifestation).</p><p/>

name: Empathic Transfer, Hostile
short_description: Your touch transfers your hurt to another.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. For every additional power point you spend, you can transfer an additional 10 points of damage (maximum 90 points per manifestation).</p><p>2. If you spend 6 additional power points, this power affects all creatures in a 20-foot-radius spread centered on you.</p><p/>

name: Empathy
short_description: You know the subject's surface emotions.
description:
<p>You detect the surface emotions of any creature you can see that is in the power's area. You can sense basic needs, drives, and emotions. Thirst, hunger, fear, fatigue, pain, rage, hatred, uncertainty, curiosity, friendliness, and many other kinds of sensations and moods can all be perceived.</p>
      <p>You gain a +2 insight bonus on any Bluff, Diplomacy, Intimidate, or Sense Motive checks that you make in the round when you cease concentrating on this power.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. For every additional power point you spend, this power's range and the radius of its area increases by 5 feet.</p><p>2. If you spend 2 additional power points, this power's maximum duration increases to 1 hour/level.</p><p/>

name: Empty Mind
short_description: Gain +2 on Will saves until your next action.
description:
<p>You empty your mind of all transitory and distracting thoughts, improving your self-control. You gain a +2 bonus on all Will saves until your next action.</p>
      <p>You can manifest this power instantly, quickly enough to gain its benefit in an emergency. Manifesting this power is an immediate action. You can use this power even when it is not your turn.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, the bonus on your Will saves increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Energy Adaptation
short_description: Your body converts energy to harmless light.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> If you spend 4 additional power points, you can manifest this power as an immediate action.</p><p/>

name: Energy Adaptation, Specified
short_description: Gain resistance 10 to one energy type.
description:
<p>As <i>energy adaptation</i>,  except you must choose one type of energy to which you gain resistance when this power is manifested.</p>
      <p>This power's subtype is the same as the type of damage it protects against.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> If you spend 4 additional power points, you can manifest this power as an immediate action.</p><p/>

name: Energy Ball
saving_throw: Reflex half or Fortitude half; see text
short_description: Deal 7d6 energy damage in 20-ft. radius.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by one die (d6). For each extra two dice of damage, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Energy Bolt
saving_throw: Reflex half or Fortitude half; see text
short_description: Deal 5d6 energy damage in 120-ft. line.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by one die (d6). For each extra two dice of damage, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Energy Burst
saving_throw: Reflex half or Fortitude half; see text
short_description: Deal 5d6 energy damage in 40-ft. burst.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by one die (d6). For each extra two dice of damage, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Energy Cone
saving_throw: Reflex half or Fortitude half; see text
short_description: Null
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by one die (d6). For each extra two dice of damage, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Energy Conversion
range: Personal and close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels); see text
short_description: Offensively channel energy you've absorbed.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> If you spend 4 additional power points, you can manifest this power as an immediate action.</p><p/>
full_text:
<div topic="Energy Conversion" level="5"><p><h5>Energy Conversion</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism [see text]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 7<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal and close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels); see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Effect:</b><br/></td><td>Ray; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>13<br/></td></tr></table><p>As <i>energy adaptation</i>, except that instead of radiating away energy as light, you store up the energy and can later discharge it as a ray. To discharge a ray requires a standard action. You can choose to fire any number of rays during the power's duration. The ray you fire must be of one of the energy types you have stored (if you have stored more than one type, you can choose what kind of energy to use for each ray). If a ray successfully strikes its target (requiring a ranged touch attack), the target takes damage equal to the amount of energy damage of that type you have stored, up to a maximum of three times your manifester level. As long as this power remains in effect, you can continue to absorb energy damage and fire additional rays using the stored damage.</p><p>This power's subtype is the same as the type of energy you discharge in a ray; thus, its subtype can change during the course of the power's duration.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Energy Current
target: Any two creatures no more than 15 ft. apart
saving_throw: Reflex half or Fortitude half; see text
short_description: Null
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by one die (d6). For each extra two dice of damage, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p>2. For every 4 additional power points you spend, this power can affect an additional secondary target. Any additional secondary target cannot be more than 15 feet from another target of the power.</p><p/>

name: Energy Missile
target: Up to five creatures or objects; no two targets can be more than 15 ft. apart.
saving_throw: Reflex half or Fortitude half; see text
short_description: Deal 3d6 energy damage to up to five subjects.3Energy Cone: Deal 5d6 energy damage in 60-ft. cone.4Control Body: Take rudimentary control of your foe's limbs.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by one die (d6) and its save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Energy Push
saving_throw: Reflex half or Fortitude half; see text
short_description: Deal 2d6 damage and knock subject back.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's damage increases by one die (d6) and its save DC increases by 1. The damage increase applies to both the initial blast and any damage from impact with an object.</p><p/>

name: Energy Ray
short_description: Deal 1d6 energy (cold, electricity, fire, or sonic) damage.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by one die (d6).</p><p/>

name: Energy Retort
range: Personal and close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels); see text
target: You and creature or object attacking you; see text
saving_throw: Reflex half or Fortitude half; see text
short_description: Ectoburst of energy automatically targets your attacker for 4d6 damage once each round.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's duration increases by 1 minute.</p><p/>

name: Energy Stun
saving_throw: Reflex half or Fortitude half; see text
short_description: Deal 1d6 damage and stun target if it fails both saves.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by one die (d6) and its save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Energy Wall
area: An opaque sheet of energy up to 20 ft. long/level or a ring of energy with a radius of up to 5 ft./2 levels
saving_throw: Reflex half or Fortitude half; see text
short_description: Create wall of your chosen energy type.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Energy Wall" level="5"><p><h5>Energy Wall</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity (Creation) [see text]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 3<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Area:</b><br/></td><td>An opaque sheet of energy up to 20 ft. long/level or a ring of energy with a radius of up to 5 ft./2 levels<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Concentration + 1 round/level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Reflex half or Fortitude half; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>5<br/></td></tr></table><p>Upon manifesting this power, you choose cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. You create an immobile sheet of energy of the chosen type formed out of unstable ectoplasm. One side of the wall, selected by you, sends forth waves of energy, dealing 2d6 points of damage to creatures and objects within 10 feet and 1d6 points of damage to those beyond 10 feet but within 20 feet. In addition, anyone passing though the <i>energy wall</i> takes 2d6 points of damage +1 point per manifester level (maximum +20).</p><p>If you manifest the wall so that it appears where creatures are, each creature takes damage as if passing through the wall.</p><p>If you manifest this power in the form of a ring of energy, you choose whether the waves of energy radiate inward or outward from the ring.</p><p><i>Cold:</i> A sheet of this energy type deals +1 point of damage per die. The saving throw to reduce damage from a <i>cold wall</i> is a Fortitude save instead of a Reflex save.</p><p><i>Electricity:</i> Manifesting a sheet of this energy type provides a +2 bonus to the save DC and a +2 bonus on manifester level checks for the purpose of overcoming power resistance.</p><p><i>Fire:</i> A sheet of this energy type deals +1 point of damage per die.</p><p><i>Sonic:</i> A sheet of this energy type deals -1 point of damage per die and ignores an object's hardness.</p><p>This power's subtype is the same as the type of energy you manifest.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Energy Wave
saving_throw: Reflex half or Fortitude half; see text
short_description: Deal 13d4 damage of your chosen energy type in 120-ft. cone.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by one die (d6). For each extra two dice of damage, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Entangling Ectoplasm
short_description: You entangle a foe in sticky goo.
description: <p>You draw forth a glob of ectoplasmic goo from the Astral Plane and immediately throw it as a ranged touch attack at any creature in range. On a successful hit, the subject is covered in goo and becomes entangled. The goo evaporates at the end of the power's duration.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power can affect a target one size category larger.</p><p/>

name: Eradicate Invisibility
target: You and all invisible creatures and objects in a 50-ft. -radius burst centered on you
short_description: Negate invisibility in 50-ft. burst.
description:
<p>You radiate a psychokinetic burst that disrupts and negates all types of invisibility (though this power can't negate the effect of <i>cloud mind</i>). Any creature that fails its save to avoid the effect loses its invisibility.</p>
      <p>Creatures that are naturally invisible, such as an invisible stalker, are revealed as a dim outline for 1 round (until the beginning of your next turn) and do not have total concealment during this period.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's range and the radius of the burst in which it functions both increase by 5 feet.</p><p/>

name: Escape Detection
short_description: You become difficult to detect with clairsentience powers.
description:
<p>You (plus all your gear and any objects you carry) become difficult to detect by clairsentience powers such as <i>clairvoyant sense</i>, <i>remote viewing</i>, and <i>psionic true seeing</i>. If a clairsentience power or similar effect is attempted against you, the manifester of the power must succeed on a manifester level check (1d20 + manifester level, or caster level if the opponent is not a manifester) against a DC of 13 + your manifester level (maximum +10).</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Escape Detection" level="5"><p><h5>Escape Detection</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psychic warrior 3, seer 3<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 hour/level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>5<br/></td></tr></table><p>You (plus all your gear and any objects you carry) become difficult to detect by clairsentience powers such as <i>clairvoyant sense</i>, <i>remote viewing</i>, and <i>psionic true seeing</i>. If a clairsentience power or similar effect is attempted against you, the manifester of the power must succeed on a manifester level check (1d20 + manifester level, or caster level if the opponent is not a manifester) against a DC of 13 + your manifester level (maximum +10).</p><p/>
</div>

name: Ethereal Jaunt, Psionic
short_description: Become ethereal for 1 round/level.8Time Hop, Mass: Willing subjects hop forward in time.9Teleportation Circle, Psionic: Circle teleports any creatures inside to designated spot.Time RegressionX: Relive the last round.
description:
<p>As the <i>ethereal jaunt</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Ethereal Jaunt, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Ethereal Jaunt, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Nomad 7<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round/level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>13<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>ethereal jaunt</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Etherealness, Psionic
target: You and one other touched willing creature/three levels; all targets must be joined by linked hands
short_description: Null
description:
<p>As the <i>etherealness</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Etherealness, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Etherealness, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 9<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Targets:</b><br/></td><td>You and one other touched willing creature/three levels; all targets must be joined by linked hands<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes (harmless)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>17<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>etherealness</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Evade Burst
short_description: You take no damage from a burst on a successful Reflex save.
description:
<p>You throw off a faux ectoplasmic shell, allowing you to slide out of range of a damaging effect. When you manifest this power in conjunction with making a successful Reflex save against an attack that normally deals half damage on a successful save, you instead take no damage.</p>
      <p>You can manifest this power with an instant thought, quickly enough to save yourself if you unexpectedly come within range of a dangerous effect. Manifesting this power is an immediate action. You can even manifest this power when it isn't your turn.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> If you spend 4 additional power points, you take only half damage on a failed Reflex save.</p><p/>

name: Exhalation of the Black Dragon
short_description: Your acid breath deals 3d6 damage to a close target.
description: <p>You spit forth vitriolic acid, originating from your mouth, at your target. If you succeed on a ranged touch attack, the target takes 3d6 points of acid damage.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's damage increases by 1d6 points.</p><p/>

name: Expansion
short_description: Become one size category larger.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or more of the following ways.</p><p>1. If you spend 6 additional power points, this power increases your size by two size categories instead of one. You gain a +4 size bonus to Strength, a -4 size penalty to Dexterity (to a minimum effective Dexterity score of 1), a -2 size penalty on attack rolls, and a -2 size penalty to Armor Class due to your increased size.</p><p>2. If you spend 6 additional power points, you can manifest this power as a swift action instead of a standard action.</p><p>3. If you spend 2 additional power points, this power's duration is 10 minutes per level rather than 1 round per level.</p><p/>

name: Fabricate, Psionic
target: Up to 10 cu. ft./level; see spell text
short_description: Transforms raw goods to finished items.
description:
<p>As the <i>fabricate</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Fabricate, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Fabricate, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity (Creation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Shaper 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>See spell text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>Up to 10 cu. ft./level; see spell text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>fabricate</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Fabricate, Greater Psionic
short_description: Transforms a lot of raw goods to finished items.
description:
<p>As <i>psionic fabricate</i>, except ten times as much material is affected by the power.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Fabricate, Greater Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Fabricate, Greater Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity (Creation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Shaper 6<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>Up to 100 cu. ft./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>11<br/></td></tr></table><p>As <i>psionic fabricate</i>, except ten times as much material is affected by the power.</p><p/>
</div>

name: False Sensory Input
short_description: Subject sees what isn't there.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power can affect an additional target. Any additional target cannot be more than 15 feet from another target of the power.</p><p/>

name: Far Hand
target: A nonmagical, unattended object weighing up to 5 lb.
short_description: Move small objects at a limited distance.
description: <p>You can mentally lift and move an object at will from a distance. As a move action, you can propel the object as far as 15 feet in any direction, though the power ends if the distance between you and the object exceeds the power's range.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's range increases by 5 feet.</p><p>2. For every additional power point you spend, the weight limit of the target increases by 2 pounds.</p><p/>

name: Fate Link
target: Any two living creatures that are initially no more than 30 ft. apart.
short_description: You link the fates of two targets.4Anchored Navigation: Establish a mishap-free teleport beacon.
description:
<p>You temporarily link the fates of any two creatures, if both fail their saving throws. If either linked creature experiences pain, both feel it. When one loses hit points, the other loses the same amount. If one takes nonlethal damage, so does the other. If one creature is subjected to an effect to which it is immune (such as a type of energy damage), the linked creature is not subjected to it either. If one dies, the other must immediately succeed on a Fortitude save against this power's save DC or gain two negative levels.</p>
      <p>No other effects are transferred by the <i>fate link</i>.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Fate of One
short_description: Null
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Fate of One" level="5"><p><h5>Fate of One</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Seer 7<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 immediate action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>13<br/></td></tr></table><p>Your limited omniscience allows you to reroll a saving throw, attack roll, or skill check. Whatever the result of the reroll, you must use it even if it is worse than the original roll.</p><p>You can manifest this power instantly, quickly enough to gain its benefits in an emergency. Manifesting this power is an immediate action. If you use the power to reroll a saving throw, you can manifest this power even when it is not your turn.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Feat Leech
short_description: Borrow another's psionic or metapsionic feats.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Fiery Discorporation
duration: Instantaneous and up to one day; see text
short_description: Cheat death by discorporating into nearby fire for one day.6Dispelling Buffer: Subject is buffered from one dispel psionics effect.
description:
<p>You use your mastery of energy to cheat death. If you are within 30 feet of an open flame, you can use this power. Any damage that would reduce you to 0 hit points or lower instead has a chance to discorporate you. You attempt a Will save (DC 5 + damage dealt); if it succeeds, you simply break apart into dozens of flitting tongues of flame and vanish, along with all your gear and anything you are holding or carrying.</p>
      <p>One day later, you reappear adjacent to an open flame nearest to the place where you discorporated, seeming to materialize from the fire (you choose where you appear along the perimeter of that open flame). While discorporated, you do not exist-you can do nothing, nor can any of your enemies do anything to you.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 3 additional power points you spend, you gain a +1 bonus on your Will save to determine whether you discorporate.</p><p/>

name: Fission
short_description: Null
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Fission" level="5"><p><h5>Fission</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Egoist 7<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Olfactory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Effect:</b><br/></td><td>Duplicate of yourself<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round/level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>13<br/></td></tr></table><p>You can divide yourself, creating a duplicate that comes into existence 5 feet away. Your duplicate thinks and acts exactly as you do and follows your orders, although it will not do anything you wouldn't do yourself. Your duplicate has all your abilities but none of your psionic or magical equipment (it does possess a duplicate of all your mundane equipment, clothing, armor, and implements, as well as mundane versions of any psionic or magical equipment you have). You and your duplicate evenly split your power points, your remaining usages of pertinent special abilities for the day, and so on. You retain your psionic focus, if you maintain such when this power is manifested. Treat your duplicate as yourself with two negative levels for the purpose of determining the powers to which the duplicate has access (while the duration of this power lasts, those negative levels cannot be removed by any means). Your duplicate has all other physical traits you had at the time you manifest this power. Powers, spells, or other effects affecting you when you manifest this power do not transfer to your duplicate.</p><p>When the duration expires or when you dismiss the power, you and your duplicate rejoin, no matter how far from each other you are. You gain back any power points the duplicate has not spent. At the time of rejoining, you take half of the damage your duplicate has taken since this power was manifested. This damage could potentially leave you with negative hit points, but it can't reduce your hit points to less than -9.</p><p>If your duplicate dies before the duration expires, no rejoining occurs, and you gain one negative level. If you die, your duplicate remains in existence, and is for all intents you, but with two negative levels. (Once the duration expires, one of the negative levels immediately converts to one lost level; the other negative level can be removed by standard means.)</p><p>You can have only one <i>fissioned</i> duplicate in existence at one time; your duplicate cannot use this power. You cannot use <i>fusion</i> or <i>metaconcert</i> with a duplicate, or share any other power or effect that pools abilities (the sum of you and you is still just you). Similarly, attempting to use powers such as <i>claws of the vampire</i> or <i>vampiric blade</i> to hurt your duplicate only damages your duplicate; these powers do not heal you. <i>Empathic transfer</i> and similar powers are likewise ineffective (transferring wounds to yourself isn't a good healing strategy).</p><p>All powers affecting a <i>fissioned</i> creature, either the original or the duplicate, end when the <i>fission</i> ends. All damage, including hit point damage, ability damage, ability drain, and ability burn damage, is added together.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Float
short_description: Buoy yourself in water or other liquid.
description:
<p>You mentally support yourself in water or similar liquid. You can swim at a speed of 10 feet using the power alone, or use it to boost your swim speed by 10 feet.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Float" level="5"><p><h5>Float</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 1, psychic warrior 1<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round/level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>1<br/></td></tr></table><p>You mentally support yourself in water or similar liquid. You can swim at a speed of 10 feet using the power alone, or use it to boost your swim speed by 10 feet.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Fly, Psionic
short_description: You fly at a speed of 60 ft.5Baleful Teleport: Destructive teleport deals 9d6 damage.
description:
<p>As the <i>fly</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Fly, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Fly, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Nomad 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>fly</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Force Screen
short_description: Invisible disc provides +4 shield bonus to AC.
description: <p>You create an invisible mobile disk of force that hovers in front of you. The <i>force screen</i> provides a +4 shield bonus to Armor Class (which applies against incorporeal touch attacks, since the <i>force screen</i> is a force effect). Since it hovers in front of you, the effect has no armor check penalty associated with it.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 4 additional power points you spend, the shield bonus to Armor Class improves by 1.</p><p/>

name: Form of Doom
short_description: You transform into a frightening tentacled beast.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's duration increases by 2 rounds.</p><p/>

name: Freedom of Movement, Psionic
short_description: You cannot be held or otherwise rendered immobile.
description:
<p>As the <i>freedom of movement</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Freedom of Movement, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Freedom of Movement, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 4, psychic warrior 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>freedom of movement</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Fuse Flesh
saving_throw: Fortitude negates and Fortitude partial; see text
short_description: Fuse subject's flesh, creating a helpless mass.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Fusion
target: You and one touched willing creature of your type and your size or smaller
short_description: Null
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Fusion" level="5"><p><h5>Fusion</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Egoist 8<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory, material, and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 round<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Targets:</b><br/></td><td>You and one touched willing creature of your type and your size or smaller<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>15, XP<br/></td></tr></table><p>You and another willing, corporeal, living creature of the same or smaller size fuse into one being. As the manifester, you control the actions of the fused being. However, you can give up this control to the other creature. Once you give up control, you cannot regain it unless the other creature relinquishes it.</p><p>The fused being has your current hit points plus the other creature's current hit points. The fused being knows all the powers you and the other creature know, has the sum of your and the other creature's power points, and knows or has prepared any spells you or the other creature possesses (if any). Likewise, all feats, racial abilities, and class features are pooled (if both creatures have the same ability, the fused being gains it only once). For each of the six ability scores, the fused being's score is the higher of yours and the other creature's, and the fused being also has the higher Hit Dice or manifester level-this effectively means the fused being uses the better saving throws, attack bonus, and skill modifiers of either member, and it manifests powers at the higher of the manifester levels that you or the other creature possessed before becoming fused.</p><p>You decide what equipment is absorbed into the fused being and what equipment remains available for use. These fused items are restored once the power ends.</p><p>When the power ends, the fused being separates. The other creature appears in an area adjacent to you that you determine. If separation occurs in a cramped space, the other creature is expelled through the Astral Plane, finally coming to rest materially in the nearest empty space and taking 1d6 points of damage for each 10 feet of solid material passed through.</p><p>Damage taken by the fused being is split evenly between you and the other creature when the power ends. You do not leave the <i>fusion</i> with more hit points than you entered it with, unless you were damaged prior to the <i>fusion</i> and the fused being was subsequently healed. In a like manner, the fused being's remaining power points are split between you and the other creature (you can leave with more points than you entered with, as long as you don't exceed the maximum power points for your level and ability score). Ability damage and negative levels are also split between you and the other creature. (If an odd number of negative levels or ability score reductions must be split, you decide whether you or the other creature receives the additional loss.)</p><p>If a fused being is killed, it separates into its constituent creatures, both ofwhich are also dead. You cannot use <i>fission</i> on a fused being.</p><p><i>XP Cost:</i> 50 XP.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Genesis
effect: A demiplane coterminous with the Astral Plane, centered on your location
short_description: You instigate a new demiplane on the Astral Plane.
augment: Null
full_text:
