<div topic="Genesis" level="5"><p><h5>Genesis</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity (Creation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Shaper 9<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>One week (8 hours/day)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>180 ft.; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Effect:</b><br/></td><td>A demiplane coterminous with the Astral Plane, centered on your location<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>17, XP<br/></td></tr></table><p>You create a finite plane with limited access: a demiplane. Demiplanes created by this power are very small, very minor planes. This power works best when manifested while you are on the Astral Plane. Manifestation of this power creates a local density fluctuation that precipitates the creation of a demiplane. At first, the fledgling plane grows in radius at a rate of 1 foot per day to an initial maximum radius of 180 feet as it rapidly draws substance from the surrounding astral ectoplasm. Once the new demiplane reaches its maximum size, it doesn't really stop growing, but its growth rate decreases to only 1 foot per week (approximately a 50-foot increase in radius per year). Once your demiplane is created, you can travel to it using <i>astral caravan</i>, <i>plane shift</i>, or some other power or permanent link that you arrange for separately.</p><p>You determine the environment within the demiplane when you manifest <i>genesis</i>,  reflecting most any desire you can visualize. You determine factors such as atmosphere, water, temperature, and the general shape of the terrain. This power cannot create life (including vegetation), nor can it create construction (such as buildings, roads, wells, dungeons, and so forth). You must add these details in some other fashion if you desire. You can't create lingering psionic effects with this power; you have to add those separately, if desired. Similarly, you can't create a demiplane out of esoteric material, such as silver or uranium; you're limited to stone and dirt. You can't manipulate the time trait on your demiplane; its time trait is as the Material Plane. Once your demiplane reaches 180 feet in radius, you can manifest this power again to gradually add another 180 feet of radius to it, and so on.</p><p>Antigenesis: If <i>genesis</i> is manifested on the Material Plane, the power takes effect and the demiplane begins to grow at the rate noted above, but it gets no larger than a radius of 1 foot per level. The energies of the new plane are exactly canceled by the energies of the original plane, creating a dead spot like a limited cancer on the original plane. The expanding boundary of the dead spot wipes away all construction, crumbles natural land forms, and evaporates water, leaving behind a uniformly level area of inert dust. Living creatures that pass the boundary of the growing dead spot are not directly affected, but plants can find no sustenance in the dust of the dead spot, water-breathing creatures die quickly when water turns to dust, and mobile animals know enough to leave the area alone. Once the wave of change passes, no special essence remains in the dead spot, and it may be colonized naturally over the course of several years by bacteria, plants, and animals.</p><p><i>XP Cost:</i> 1,000 XP.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Graft Weapon
short_description: Your hand is replaced seamlessly by your weapon.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Graft Weapon" level="5"><p><h5>Graft Weapon</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psychic warrior 3<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Olfactory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>24 hours (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>5<br/></td></tr></table><p>You attach any melee weapon you can use in one hand-mundane, psionic, or magical-onto the end of one of your arms. The weapon becomes a natural extension of your arm, and that hand blends seamlessly into the shaft, hilt, or head of the weapon. Now that the weapon and you are one, you gain a +1 competence bonus on all attack and damage rolls while using the weapon.</p><p>The grafted weapon is considered both a standard weapon and a natural weapon for the purpose of effects that distinguish between either weapon type. For instance, the grafted weapon is treated as a natural weapon for the purpose of delivering a touch attack with a power in conjunction with the weapon attack. As with any power (or spell) melee touch attack made in conjunction with a natural weapon attack, the touch attack effect is not delivered unless the natural weapon strikes normally; on a failed attack, the touch power (or spell) is wasted.</p><p>For a psychic warrior under the effect of the <i>claws of the beast</i> power, grafting a weapon means that attacks with this hand deal the base damage of the weapon, instead of the claw upon which a psychic warrior normally relies.</p><p>While your hand is grafted to a weapon, you lose the use of that hand and take a -2 penalty on all skill checks requiring the use of hands. Powers that temporarily polymorph or metamorph you can ignore the grafted weapon or alter it normally, at your discretion. If the weapon takes damage, you take damage as well. If you are healed, so is your grafted weapon. If your weapon is destroyed, you permanently lose 2 points of Constitution; the ability drain persists until you can restore your natural anatomy (by means of <i>regenerate</i> or a similar effect).</p><p>When this power's duration expires, the grafted weapon falls to the ground and your hand returns.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Grease, Psionic
short_description: Makes 10-ft. square or one object slippery.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Grease, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Grease, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity (Creation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 1<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual and olfactory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target or Area:</b><br/></td><td>One object or a 10-ft. square<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round/level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>See spell text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>1<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>grease</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p>Sometimes this power is referred to as <i>ectoplasmic sheen</i>.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Grip of Iron
short_description: Your iron grip gives +4 bonus on grapple checks.
description:
<p>You can improve your chances in a grapple as an immediate action, gaining a +4 enhancement bonus on your grapple checks.</p>
      <p>You can manifest this power with an instant thought, quickly enough to gain the benefit of the power in the current round. Manifesting this power is an immediate action. You can manifest this power when it isn't your turn (if you are grappled).</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 4 additional power points you spend, the enhancement bonus on your grapple checks increases by 2.</p><p/>

name: Hail of Crystals
short_description: A crystal explodes in an area, dealing 9d4 slashing damage.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage from the explosion of the crystal increases by 1d4 points.</p><p/>

name: Hustle
short_description: Instantly gain a move action.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Hustle" level="5"><p><h5>Hustle</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Egoist 3, psychic warrior 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 swift action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Effect:</b><br/></td><td>1 extra move action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>Egoist 5, psychic warrior 3<br/></td></tr></table><p>You gain an additional move action in the current round. Taking a full round's worth of attacks and then using this power to move away from your foe does provoke attacks of opportunity.</p><p>You can manifest this power with an instant thought, quickly enough to gain the benefit of the power before you move. Manifesting the power is a swift action, like manifesting a quickened power, and it counts toward the normal limit of one quickened power per round. You cannot manifest this power when it isn't your turn.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Hypercognition
manifesting_time: 1 standard action or 1 immediate action; see text
short_description: Null
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Hypercognition" level="5"><p><h5>Hypercognition</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Seer 8<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action or 1 immediate action; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>15<br/></td></tr></table><p>You make lightning-fast deductions based on only the slightest clue, pattern, or scrap of memory resident in your mind. You can make reasonable statements about a person, place, or object, seemingly from very little knowledge. However, your knowledge is in fact the result of a rigorously logical process that you force your mind to undertake, digging up and correlating every possible piece of knowledge bearing on the topic (possibly even extracting echoes of knowledge from the Astral Plane).</p><p>The nature of the knowledge you gain concerning the subject of your analysis might include the answer to a riddle, the way out of a maze, stray bits of information about a person, legends about a place or an object, or even a conclusion concerning a dilemma that your conscious mind is unable to arrive at.</p><p>An Intelligence check may be required to obtain the desired information. If so, you can manifest <i>hypercognition</i> as an immediate action prior to making the check and receive a +20 bonus for doing so.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Id Insinuation
short_description: Swift tendrils of thought disrupt and confuse your target.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1, and the power can affect an additional target. Any additional target cannot be more than 15 feet from another target of the power.</p><p/>

name: Identify, Psionic
short_description: Learn the properties of a psionic item.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Identify, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Identify, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material and mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>One day<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One touched object<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>3<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>identify</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p>This power is used to identify the abilities of psionic items.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Immovability
short_description: You are almost impossible to move and gain damage reduction 15/-.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> If you spend 8 additional power points, you can manifest this power as an immediate action.</p><p/>

name: Incarnate
short_description: Make some powers permanent.
augment: Null

name: Inertial Armor
short_description: Tangible field of force provides you with +4 armor bonus to AC.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, the armor bonus to Armor Class increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Inertial Barrier
short_description: Gain damage reduction 5/-.Psychic Vampire. Touch attack drains 2 power points/level from foe.
description:
<p>You create a skin-tight psychokinetic barrier around yourself that resists blows, cuts, stabs, and slashes, as well as providing some protection against falling. You gain damage reduction 5/-. <i>Inertial barrier</i> also absorbs half the damage you take from any fall.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Inertial Barrier" level="5"><p><h5>Inertial Barrier</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychokinesis<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Kineticist 4, psychic warrior 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory and mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>You create a skin-tight psychokinetic barrier around yourself that resists blows, cuts, stabs, and slashes, as well as providing some protection against falling. You gain damage reduction 5/-. <i>Inertial barrier</i> also absorbs half the damage you take from any fall.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Inflict Pain
short_description: Telepathic stab gives your foe -4 on attack rolls, or -2 if he makes the save.
description: <p>You telepathically stab the mind of your foe, causing horrible agony. The subject suffers wracking pain that imposes a -4 penalty on attack rolls, skill checks, and ability checks. If the target makes its save, it takes only a -2 penalty.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1, and the power can affect an additional target. Any additional target cannot be more than 15 feet from another target of the power.</p><p/>

name: Insanity
short_description: Subject is permanently confused.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1, and the power can affect an additional target. Any additional target cannot be more than 15 feet from another target of the power.</p><p/>

name: Intellect Fortress
short_description: Those inside fortress take only half damage from all powers and psi-like abilities until your next action.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's duration increases by 1 round.</p><p/>

name: Iron Body, Psionic
short_description: Your body becomes living iron.
description:
<p>As the <i>iron body</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Iron Body, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Iron Body, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity (Creation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 8<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>15<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>iron body</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Keen Edge, Psionic
target: One weapon or fifty projectiles, all of which must be in contact with each other at the time of manifestation
short_description: Doubles normal weapon's threat range.
description:
<p>As the <i>keen edge</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Keen Edge, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Keen Edge, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 3, psychic warrior 3<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Targets:</b><br/></td><td>One weapon or fifty projectiles, all of which must be in contact with each other at the time of manifestation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates (harmless, object)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes (harmless, object)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>5<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>keen edge</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Knock, Psionic
target: One door, box, or chest with an area of up to 10 sq. ft./level
short_description: Opens locked or psionically sealed door.
description:
<p>As the <i>knock</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Knock, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Knock, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One door, box, or chest with an area of up to 10 sq. ft./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous; see spell text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>3<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>knock</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Know Direction and Location
short_description: You discover where you are and what direction you face.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Know Direction and Location" level="5"><p><h5>Know Direction and Location</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 1<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>1<br/></td></tr></table><p>You generally know where you are. This power is useful to characters who end up at unfamiliar destinations after teleporting, using a <i>gate</i>,  or traveling to or from other planes of existence. The power reveals general information about your location as a feeling or presentiment. The information is usually no more detailed than a summary that locates you according to a prominent local or regional site. Using this power also tells you what direction you are facing.</p><p>Using this power prior to making a Knowledge (the planes) check with <i>astral caravan</i> grants a +2 bonus on the check.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Leech Field
short_description: Leech power points each time you make a saving throw.
description:
<p>You raise a field of potentiality that drains the vitality from powers that you successfully save against. When you succeed on a saving throw to negate the effect of a foe's power on you, and the power is one that <i>leech field</i> is effective against (see below), your body erupts in a brief flash of crackling dark energy. You gain 1 power point for every 2 power points your foe spent to manifest the power you just saved against (to a maximum number of points equal to your manifester level). You cannot gain power points that would cause you to exceed your normal daily maximum.</p>
      <p>This power is effective against any power that targets a single creature and allows the target a saving throw to negate it, except those that are delivered by a touch attack or a ranged touch attack (including a ray).</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's duration increases by 1 minute.</p><p/>

name: Levitate, Psionic
range: Personal or close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
target: You or one willing creature or one object (total weight up to 100 lb./level)
short_description: You move up and down, forward and back, via mental support.
augment: Null

name: Major Creation, Psionic
short_description: As psionic minor creation, plus stone and metal.
description:
<p>As the <i>major creation</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Major Creation, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Major Creation, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity (Creation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 5<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>10 minutes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>See spell text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>9<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>major creation</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Matter Agitation
area: 2 sq. ft. of surface area of an object or creature
short_description: You heat a creature or object.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Matter Agitation" level="5"><p><h5>Matter Agitation</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychokinesis<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 1<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory and material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Area:</b><br/></td><td>2 sq. ft. of surface area of an object or creature<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Concentration, up to 1 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>1<br/></td></tr></table><p>You can excite the structure of a nonpsionic, nonmagical object, heating it to the point of combustion over time. The agitation grows more intense in the second and third rounds after you manifest the power, as described below.</p><p><i>1st Round:</i> Readily flammable material (paper, dry grass, tinder, torches) ignites. Skin reddens (1 point of damage).</p><p><i>2nd Round:</i> Wood smolders and smokes, metal becomes hot to the touch, skin blisters (1d4 points of damage), hair smolders, paint shrivels, water boils.</p><p><i>3rd and Subsequent Rounds:</i> Wood ignites, metal scorches (1d4 points of damage for those holding metallic objects). Skin burns and hair ignites (1d6 points of damage), lead melts.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Matter Manipulation
short_description: Increase or decrease an object's base hardness by 5.
xp_cost: 250 XP for each point by which the object's hardness is altered.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Matter Manipulation" level="5"><p><h5>Matter Manipulation</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 8<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory and mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Area:</b><br/></td><td>1 cu. ft./level of inanimate material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>15, XP<br/></td></tr></table><p>You can weaken or strengthen the substance of an object or structure. You can affect both mundane and magical inanimate material. Weakening an object's substance decreases its hardness and hit points, and strengthening it increases its hardness and hit points. You can increase or decrease an object's hardness by up to 5 from its original hardness. When hardness increases, the object (or portion of an object) gains 3 hit points per inch of thickness for every point of increased hardness. When hardness decreases, the object (or portion of an object) loses 2 hit points per inch of thickness for every point of decreased hardness (to a minimum of 1 hit point per inch of thickness).</p><p>You can't decrease the hardness of an object that already has hardness 0.</p><p><i>Working Manipulated Metals:</i> An object or portion thereof whose hardness is decreased or increased is permanently changed. Even hardening adamantine to 25 is possible. You can also harden or weaken a preforged weapon, a suit of armor, or some other finished item.</p><p><i>XP Cost:</i> 250 XP for each point by which the object's hardness is altered.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Mental Barrier
short_description: Gain +4 deflection bonus to AC until your next action.
description:
<p>You project a field of improbability around yourself, creating a fleeting protective shell. You gain a +4 deflection bonus to Armor Class.</p>
      <p>You can manifest this power instantly, quickly enough to gain its benefits in an emergency. Manifesting the power is an immediate action. You can use this power even when it's not your turn; however, you must manifest it prior to an opponent's attack roll in order to gain this power's benefit against that attack.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. If you spend 4 additional power points, the deflection bonus to Armor Class increases by 1.</p><p>2. For every additional power point you spend, this power's duration increases by 1 round.</p><p/>

name: Mental Disruption
short_description: Daze creatures within 10 feet for 1 round.
description: <p>You generate a mental wave of confusion that instantly sweeps out from your location. All creatures you designate in the affected area (you can choose certain creatures to be unaffected) must make a Will save or become dazed for 1 round.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p>2. For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's range and the radius of its area both increase by 5 feet.</p><p/>

name: Metaconcert
target: You and up to nine other willing psionic creatures in range
short_description: Mental concert of two or more increases the total power of the participants.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's duration increases by 1 minute.</p><p/>

name: Metafaculty
short_description: Null
augment: Null

name: Metamorphosis
duration: 1 min./level (D) for a creature; 1 hour/level (D) for an object
short_description: Null
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Metamorphosis" level="5"><p><h5>Metamorphosis</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Egoist 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material and olfactory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level (D) for a creature; 1 hour/level (D) for an object<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>You assume the form of a creature of the same type as your normal form, or any other type except construct, elemental, outsider, and undead. The assumed form can have as many Hit Dice as your manifester level, to a maximum of 15.</p><p>You can't assume a form smaller than Fine, nor can you assume an incorporeal, ectoplasmic, or gaseous form. You cannot take the form of any creature that has a template. Your type and subtype (if applicable) change to match the new form.</p><p>Upon changing, you regain lost hit points as if you had rested for a night (though this healing does not restore ability damage and provide other benefits of resting; and changing back does not heal you further). If you are slain while under the effect of this power, you revert to your original form, though you remain dead. You gain the Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution scores of the new form but retain your own Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. You also gain all extraordinary special attacks possessed by the form (such as constrict, improved grab, and poison) but do not gain the extraordinary special qualities possessed by the new form (such as blindsense, fast healing, regeneration, and scent) or any supernatural, psionic, or spelllike abilities.</p><p>You retain all supernatural and spell-like special attacks and special qualities of your normal form, except for those requiring a body part that the new form does not have, if any. You keep all extraordinary special attacks and special qualities derived from class levels, but you lose any benefits of the racial traits of your normal form. If you have a template, special abilities it provides are likewise not retained. If the assumed form is capable of speech, you can communicate normally. You retain any manifesting ability you had in your original form.</p><p>You acquire the physical qualities of the new form while retaining your own mind. Physical qualities include natural size, mundane movement capabilities (such as burrowing, climbing, walking, swimming, and flight with wings, to a maximum speed of 120 feet for flying or 60 feet for nonflying movement), natural armor bonus, natural weapons (such as claws or a bite), racial bonuses on skill checks, racial bonus feats, and any anatomical qualities (presence or absence of wings, number of extremities, and so forth). A body with extra limbs does not allow you to make more attacks (or more advantageous two-weapon attacks) than normal.</p><p>You can freely designate the new form's minor physical qualities (such as hair color, hair texture, and skin color) within the normal ranges for a creature of that type. The new form's significant physical qualities (such as height, weight, and gender) are also under your control, but they must fall within the norms for the new form's species. You are effectively disguised as an average member of the new form's race. If you use this power to create a disguise, you get a +10 bonus on your Disguise check.</p><p>When the change occurs, your equipment either remains worn or held by the new form (if it is capable of wearing or holding the item in question) or melds into the new form and becomes nonfunctional. When you revert to your normal form, any objects previously melded into the new form reappear in the same location on your body they previously occupied and are once again functional. Any new items you wore in the assumed form and can't wear in your normal form fall off and land at your feet; any that you could wear in either form or carry in a body part common to both forms (mouth, hands, or the like) at the time of reversion are still held in the same way. Any part of the body or piece of equipment that is separated from the whole reverts to its normal form.</p><p>You can also use this power to assume the form of an inanimate object. You gain the object's hardness and retain your own hit points. You can take the shape of almost any simple object you can think of. If you attempt to take the form of a complex object, you must make an appropriate skill check.. If you fail the check, your manifestation of the power does not succeed. Likewise, you cannot take the form of a complex mechanical mechanism unless you have some sort of skill associated with the object. You cannot use this power to assume the form of a psionic item or a magic item, or any object with a hardness of 15 or higher. You also cannot take the form of a psionically animated mechanism or any object formed of ectoplasm.</p><p>As an inanimate object, you lose all mobility. You retain your normal senses and your ability to speak. You can manifest a power if you make a Concentration check (DC 20 + power level); however, doing so ends the duration of this power. If you take damage while in the form of an object, your actual body also takes damage (but the object's hardness, if any, protects you).</p><p/>
</div>

name: Metamorphosis, Greater
duration: 1 min./level (D) for a creature; 1 hour/level (D) for an object
short_description: Null
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Metamorphosis, Greater" level="5"><p><h5>Metamorphosis, Greater</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Egoist 9<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level (D) for a creature; 1 hour/level (D) for an object<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>17, XP<br/></td></tr></table><p>As <i>metamorphosis</i>, except that this power enables you to assume the form of any single nonunique object or creature (of any type) from Fine to Colossal size. The assumed form cannot have more Hit Dice than your manifester level (to a maximum of 25 HD). Unlike <i>metamorphosis</i>, this power allows incorporeal, ectoplasmic, or gaseous forms to be assumed.</p><p>You gain all extraordinary and supernatural abilities (both special attacks and special qualities) of the assumed form, but you lose your own supernatural abilities. You also gain the type of the new form (for example, dragon or magical beast) in place of your own. The new form does not disorient you. Parts of your body or pieces of equipment that are separated from you do not revert to their original form.</p><p>You can become just about anything you are familiar with. You can change form once each round as a swift action.</p><p>The change takes place either immediately before your regular action or immediately after it, but not during the action.</p><p>If you use this power to create a disguise, you get a +10 bonus on your Disguise check.</p><p>As an inanimate object, you lose all mobility; however, you retain your ability to manifest powers normally.</p><p><i>XP Cost:</i> 200 XP.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Metaphysical Claw
short_description: Your natural weapon gains +1 bonus.
description: <p>If you have a claw attack (either from an actual natural weapon or from an effect such as <i>claws of the beast</i>) or a bite attack (which could be a natural bite attack or one you gain by means of the power <i>bite of the wolf</i> ), you can use this power to provide one of your natural weapons a +1 enhancement bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> If you spend 4 additional power points, this power's duration increases to 1 hour per level.</p><p>In addition, for every 4 additional power points you spend, this power improves the natural weapon's enhancement bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls by 1.</p><p/>

name: Metaphysical Weapon
short_description: Weapon gains +1 bonus.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> If you spend 4 additional power points, this power's duration increases to 1 hour per level.</p><p>In addition, for every 4 additional power points you spend, this power improves the weapon's enhancement bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls by 1.</p><p/>

name: Microcosm
target: One creature; or one or more creatures within a 15-ft. -radius sphere
area: One creature; or one or more creatures within a 15-ft. -radius sphere
short_description: Creature or creature lives forevermore in world of his own imagination.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, the number of individual and group hit points the power can affect increases by 10.</p><p/>

name: Mind Blank, Personal
short_description: You are immune to scrying and mental effects.
description:
<p>As <i>Psionic mind blank</i> (see below), except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Mind Blank, Personal" level="5"><p><h5>Mind Blank, Personal</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 7, psychic warrior 6<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Olfactory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>One day<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 13, psychic warrior 11<br/></td></tr></table><p>As <i>Psionic mind blank</i> (see below), except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Mind Blank, Psionic
short_description: Subject immune to mental/emotional effects, scrying, and remote viewing.
description:
<p>The subject is protected from all devices, powers, and spells that detect, influence, or read emotions or thoughts. This power protects against powers with the mind-affecting or scrying descriptors. <i>Psionic mind blank</i> even foils <i>bend reality</i>,  <i>limited wish</i>,  <i>miracle</i>,  <i>reality revision</i>,  and <i>wish</i> when they are used in such a way as to affect the subject's mind or to gain information about it (however, <i>metafaculty</i> can pierce the protective quality of <i>psionic mind blank</i>). In the case of <i>remote viewing</i> or scrying that scans an area the creature is in, the effect works but the creature simply isn't detected. <i>remote viewing</i> (scrying) attempts that are targeted specifically at the subject do not work at all.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Mind Blank, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Mind Blank, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 8<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Olfactory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One creature<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>One day<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates (harmless)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes (harmless)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>15<br/></td></tr></table><p>The subject is protected from all devices, powers, and spells that detect, influence, or read emotions or thoughts. This power protects against powers with the mind-affecting or scrying descriptors. <i>Psionic mind blank</i> even foils <i>bend reality</i>,  <i>limited wish</i>,  <i>miracle</i>,  <i>reality revision</i>,  and <i>wish</i> when they are used in such a way as to affect the subject's mind or to gain information about it (however, <i>metafaculty</i> can pierce the protective quality of <i>psionic mind blank</i>). In the case of <i>remote viewing</i> or scrying that scans an area the creature is in, the effect works but the creature simply isn't detected. <i>remote viewing</i> (scrying) attempts that are targeted specifically at the subject do not work at all.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Mind Probe
short_description: You discover the subject's secret thoughts.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Mind Probe" level="5"><p><h5>Mind Probe</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy (Charm) [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Telepath 5<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory, material, and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 minute<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One creature<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round/level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will partial; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>9<br/></td></tr></table><p>All the subject's memories and knowledge are accessible to you, from memories deep below the surface to those still easily called to mind. You can learn the answer to one question per round, to the best of the subject's knowledge. If the subject succeeds on a Will save, it is not required to answer the question; however, making a save does not end the power. You can ask the subject a new question (or the same question) in subsequent rounds for as long as the power's duration persists.</p><p>You can probe a sleeping subject and automatically get an answer to your question. If the subject then succeeds on a Will save, it wakes after providing the answer and thereafter can resist answering by making Will saves as described above.</p><p>Subjects that do not wish to be probed can attempt to move beyond the power's range, unless they are somehow hindered. You pose the questions telepathically, and the answers to those questions are imparted directly to your mind. You and the subject do not need to speak the same language, though less intelligent creatures may yield up only appropriate visual images in answer to your questions.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Mind Seed
target: One touched Medium or smaller humanoid
short_description: Subject slowly becomes you.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Mind Seed" level="5"><p><h5>Mind Seed</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy (Compulsion) [Evil, Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Telepath 8<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One touched Medium or smaller humanoid<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>15, XP<br/></td></tr></table><p>You impress the totality of your psyche into a subject's subconscious. If successfully implanted, the seed of your mind 'germinates' over the period of one week. During this time, the subject begins to unconsciously take on your mannerisms.</p><p>When integration is complete (after one week), the subject becomes you in mind as you were when you manifested the power, but the subject's level is eight lower than your own. (In effect, the subject has received eight negative levels-but these are negative levels that can't be removed.) The subject does not have any of your physical ability scores or equipment, but does have the Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores you had when you were eight levels lower. The subject also knows the powers you knew when you were eight levels lower.</p><p>While the subject is initially your mental duplicate, the two personalities diverge over time. Although the subject starts off with memories of your experiences, it possesses its original 'soul' and physical body and is free to develop its own personality based on its own new experiences. Thus, the subject is not your slave or servant, but instead a nonplayer character in its own right that shares your earlier memories.</p><p><i>Protection from evil</i> or a similar spell or power can prevent you from implanting <i>mind seed</i>,  or prevent a seed from germinating while the protective power lasts. Otherwise, a germinating seed can be removed (prior to germination) only by <i>psychic chirurgery</i>,  <i>reality revision</i>, or similarly high-level effects. Manifesting <i>mind seed</i> again during the germination period also cleanses the subject's mind.</p><p><i>XP Cost:</i> 3,000 XP.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Mind Switch
short_description: Null
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Mind Switch, True
short_description: A permanent brain swap.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>
full_text:
<div topic="Mind Switch, True" level="5"><p><h5>Mind Switch, True</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Telepath 9<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 minute<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>17, XP<br/></td></tr></table><p>As <i>mind switch</i>,  except as noted here. You permanently exchange bodies with the subject. Since this power's duration is instantaneous, you cannot be forced to return to your natural body by means of <i>dispel psionics</i>,  an <i>antimagic field</i>,  or a similar effect. If the subject's body dies while you are in it, you are dead. The subject immediately loses one level, but otherwise survives the experience in your natural body. If your natural body dies while the subject is in it, you immediately lose one level, but you likewise survive the experience in your new body.</p><p>Your 'natural' body is always considered to be the last one you switched out of. If you exchange bodies with a chain of multiple subjects, you need worry only about the welfare of the last body you switched with. In other words, if your mind is expelled from your current body, your mind returns to the last body you switched with, not to your original body. Similarly, if your original body dies but you have since switched minds with a second subject, you take no penalty. You lose a level only if the body you inhabited immediately prior to your current body is killed.</p><p><i>XP Cost:</i> 10,000 XP.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Mind Thrust
short_description: Deal 1d10 damage.
description: <p>You instantly deliver a massive assault on the thought pathways of any one creature, dealing 1d10 points of damage to it.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by 1d10 points. For each extra 2d10 points of damage, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Mind Trap
short_description: Drain 1d6 power points from anyone who attacks you with a telepathy power.
description: <p>You set up a trap in your mind against psionic intruders. Anyone who attacks you with a telepathy power immediately loses 1d6 power points. This power's effect does not negate the power that is currently being used against you. You can manifest this power instantly, quickly enough to gain its benefit in an emergency. Manifesting the power is an immediate action. You can use this power even when it is not your turn.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's duration increases by 1 round.</p><p/>

name: Mindlink
range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels); see text
target: You and one other willing creature within range that has an Intelligence score of 3 or higher
short_description: You forge a limited mental bond with another creature.
description: <p>You forge a telepathic bond with your target. You can communicate telepathically through the bond even if you do not share a common language. No special power or influence is established as a result of the bond. Once the bond is formed, it works over any distance (although not from one plane to another).</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. If you spend 4 additional power points, you can attempt to create a telepathic bond with a creature that is not willing (Will save negates).</p><p>2. For every additional power point you spend, this power can affect an additional target. Any additional target cannot be more than 15 feet from another target of the power.</p><p/>

name: Mindlink, Thieving
range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels); see text
target: You and one other willing creature within range that has an Intelligence score of 3 or higher
short_description: Borrow knowledge of a subject's power.
description:
<p>As <i>mindlink</i>, except that if the target is a psionic character or creature that knows powers, you can temporarily borrow a power of your choice (you are aware of what powers the subject knows, up to the highest level of power you can manifest).</p>
      <p>Borrowing the subject's power is a separate standard action that provokes an attack of opportunity. If that attack succeeds, the mental communication provided by this power ends immediately. The borrowed power fades from the subject's awareness and appears within your own. You can now spend power points to manifest the borrowed power just as if it were one of your powers known. You maintain knowledge of the borrowed power until the duration of your <i>thieving mindlink</i> expires, at which time you lose knowledge of the power and the power reappears in the mind of the subject, no matter how far from you the subject is. Even if the subject is slain, you lose knowledge of the borrowed power when this power's duration expires.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Mindwipe
short_description: Subject's recent experiences wiped away, bestowing negative levels.
description:
<p>You partially wipe your victim's mind of past experiences, bestowing two negative levels upon it. If the subject has at least as many negative levels as Hit Dice, it dies. For each negative level it gains, a psionic creature loses knowledge of one power from its highest available level, and a number of power points from its maximum power point total sufficient to manifest that power. The effects of multiple negative levels stack.</p>
      <p>If the subject survives, it loses these two negative levels after 1 hour. (No Fortitude save is necessary to avoid gaining the negative level permanently.)</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can manifest this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p>2. For every 3 additional power points you spend, this power bestows an additional negative level on the subject.</p><p/>

name: Minor Creation, Psionic
effect: Unattended, nonpsionic, nonmagical object of nonliving plant matter, up to 1 cu. ft./level
short_description: Creates one cloth or wood object.
description:
<p>As the <i>minor creation</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Minor Creation, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Minor Creation, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity (Creation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Shaper 1<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 minute<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>0 ft.<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Effect:</b><br/></td><td>Unattended, nonpsionic, nonmagical object of nonliving plant matter, up to 1 cu. ft./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 hour/level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>1<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>minor creation</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Missive
short_description: Send a one-way telepathic message to subject.
description: <p>You send a telepathic message of up to ten words to any living creature within range. <i>Missive</i> is strictly a one-way exchange from you to the subject. If you do not share a common language, the subject 'hears' meaningless mental syllables.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's range increases by 5 feet.</p><p/>

name: Missive, Mass
target: All creatures in a 400 ft. + 40 ft./level radius centered on you; see text
short_description: You send a one-way telepathic message to an area.
description: <p>You send a telepathic message of up to twenty-five words to all creatures within range. You can include or exclude from this broadcast any creature you can see, as well as any creature that you know or know of. <i>Mass missive</i> is strictly a one-way exchange from you to the subjects. If you do not share a common language, the subjects 'hear' meaningless mental syllables.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's range increases by 40 feet and its save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Modify Memory, Psionic
short_description: Changes 5 minutes of subject's memories.
description:
<p>As the <i>modify memory</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Modify Memory, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Modify Memory, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy (Compulsion) [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Telepath 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One creature<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Permanent<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>modify memory</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Moment of Prescience, Psionic
short_description: You gain insight bonus on single attack roll, check, or save.
description:
<p>As the <i>moment of prescience</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Moment of Prescience, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Moment of Prescience, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 7<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round/level or until discharged<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>13<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>moment of prescience</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: My Light
effect: 20-ft. cone of light emanating from you
short_description: Your eyes emit 20-ft. cone of light.
description:
<p>Your eyes beam forth a 20-foot cone of light. You and other creatures can see normally in the light. If you walk into an area filled with psionic or magical darkness, <i>my light</i> goes dark while you stay within that area.</p>
      <p>If <i>my light</i> is used in conjunction with <i>elfsight</i>, the cone of light extends out to 40 feet instead of 20 feet.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> If you spend 2 additional power points, you can manifest this power as a swift action.</p><p/>

name: Null Psionics Field
short_description: Create a field where psionic power does not function.7Reddopsi: Powers targeting you rebound on manifester.8Telekinetic Sphere, Psionic: Mobile force globe encapsulates creature and moves it.9Tornado Blast: Vortex of air subjects your foes to 17d6 damage and moves them.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Null Psionics Field" level="5"><p><h5>Null Psionics Field</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychokinesis<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Kineticist 6<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>10 ft.<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Area:</b><br/></td><td>10-ft. -radius emanation centered on you<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>See text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>11<br/></td></tr></table><p>An invisible barrier surrounds you and moves with you. The space within this barrier is impervious to most psionic effects, including powers, psi-like abilities, and supernatural abilities. Likewise, it prevents the functioning of any psionic items or powers within its confines. A <i>null psionics field</i> suppresses any power or psionic effect used within, brought into, or manifested into its area, but does not negate it. Time spent within a <i>null psionics field</i> counts against a suppressed effect's duration.</p><p>Astral constructs and summoned creatures wink out if they enter a <i>null psionics field</i>. They reappear in the same spot once the field goes away. Time spent winked out counts normally against the duration of the power that is maintaining the construct or summoned creature.</p><p>Creation powers with instantaneous durations and calling powers are not affected by a <i>null psionics field</i> because the power itself is no longer in effect, only its result.</p><p>A normal creature (a normally encountered construct rather than a created one, for instance) can enter the area, as can normal missiles. Furthermore, while a psionic sword does not function psionically within the area, it is still a sword (and a masterwork sword at that). The power has no effect on golems and other constructs that are imbued with magic during their creation process and are thereafter self-supporting (unless they have been summoned or have a limited duration, in which case they are treated like any other summoned creatures). Elementals, corporeal undead, and outsiders are likewise unaffected unless summoned. These creatures' spell-like or supernatural abilities, however, may be temporarily nullified by the field.</p><p><i>Dispel psionics</i> does not remove the field. Two or more <i>null psionics fields</i> sharing any of the same space have no effect on each other. Certain powers may be unaffected by <i>null psionics field</i> (see the individual power descriptions). Artifacts and deities are unaffected by mortal power such as this. Should a creature's space extend across the boundary of the area enclosed by the field, any part of the creature that lies outside the effect is unaffected by the field.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Oak Body
short_description: Your body becomes as hard as oak.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's duration increases by 1 minute.</p><p/>

name: Object Reading
short_description: Learn details about an object's previous owner.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's maximum duration increases by 10 minutes.</p><p/>

name: Overland Flight, Psionic
short_description: You fly at a speed of 40 ft. and can hustle over long distances.
description:
<p>As the <i>overland flight</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Overland Flight, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Overland Flight, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 6<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 hour/level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>11<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>overland flight</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Painful Strike
short_description: Your natural weapons deal an extra 1d6 nonlethal damage.
description: <p>Your natural weapons cause additional pain. Each successful attack you make with a natural weapon deals an extra 1d6 points of nonlethal damage to the target.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> If you spend 6 additional power points, you can manifest this power as a swift action.</p><p/>

name: Personality Parasite
short_description: Subject's mind calves self-antagonistic splinter personality for 1 round/level.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Personality Parasite" level="5"><p><h5>Personality Parasite</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One Medium or smaller humanoid<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round/level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>You attempt to briefly partition the mind of your foe, calving off a minor personality that is antagonistic to the main personality. The parasitic personality functions with complete autonomy from the main personality. It does not control the body physically, but it can take one standard action each round that is purely mental, such as manifesting a power, in the same turn that the subject takes its normal actions.</p><p>The parasitic personality manifests powers using the subject's power point reserve and known powers, but can only manifest powers three or more levels lower than the highest level of power the subject can normally manifest.</p><p>The parasitic personality actively attempts to manifest powers that negatively impact the subject, using the highest-level powers possible (so as to deplete the subject's power point reserve), and the most deadly to the subject. You do not have control over what the parasitic personality does, though it always works against the interest of the subject.</p><p>Both minds communicate with each other telepathically. If a creature is targeted by a compulsion or charm effect while under the effect of this power, it can make a second saving throw if the first one fails. If both saving throws fail, then this power ends and the creature is affected by the charm or compulsion effect.</p><p>The parasitic personality does not gain any advantages if the main personality is subjected to a <i>haste</i> or <i>schism</i> effect.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Phase Door, Psionic
effect: Ethereal 5-ft. by 8-ft. opening, 10 ft. deep + 5 ft. deep per three levels
short_description: Invisible passage through wood or stone.
description:
<p>As the <i>phase door</i> spell, except as noted here. This power is subject to <i>dispel psionics</i>.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Phase Door, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Phase Door, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 7<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>0 ft.<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Effect:</b><br/></td><td>Ethereal 5-ft. by 8-ft. opening, 10 ft. deep + 5 ft. deep per three levels<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>One usage per two levels<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>13<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>phase door</i> spell, except as noted here. This power is subject to <i>dispel psionics</i>.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Plane Shift, Psionic
target: Willing creature touched, or up to eight willing creatures joining hands
short_description: Travel to other planes.
description:
<p>As the <i>plane shift</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Plane Shift, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Plane Shift, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 5<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Targets:</b><br/></td><td>Willing creature touched, or up to eight willing creatures joining hands<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>9<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>plane shift</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Power Leech
duration: Concentration, up to 1 round/level; see text
short_description: Drain 1d6 power points/round while you maintain concentration; you gain 1/round.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Power Leech" level="5"><p><h5>Power Leech</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy (Compulsion) [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>Any psionic creature<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Concentration, up to 1 round/level; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>Your brow erupts with an arc of crackling dark energy that connects with your foe, draining it of 1d6 power points and adding 1 of those points to your reserve (unless that gain would cause you to exceed your maximum).</p><p>The drain continues in each round you maintain concentration while the subject of the drain remains in range. If the subject is drained to 0 power points, this power ends.</p><p>Concentrating to maintain <i>power leech</i> is a full-round action (you can take no other actions aside from a 5-foot step) instead of a standard action.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Power Resistance
short_description: The astral construct gains power resistance equal to 10 + its Hit Dice.
description:
<p>The creature gains power resistance equal to 12 + your manifester level.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
