<div topic="Power Resistance" level="5"><p><h5>Power Resistance</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 5<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>Creature touched<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates (harmless)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes (harmless)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>9<br/></td></tr></table><p>The creature gains power resistance equal to 12 + your manifester level.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Precognition
short_description: Gain +2 insight bonus to one roll.2Clairvoyant Sense: See and hear a distant location.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Precognition" level="5"><p><h5>Precognition</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Seer 1<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>1<br/></td></tr></table><p><i>Precognition</i> allows your mind to glimpse fragments of potential future events-what you see will probably happen if no one takes action to change it. However, your vision is incomplete, and it makes no real sense until the actual events you glimpsed begin to unfold. That's when everything begins to come together, and you can act, if you act swiftly, on the information you previously received when you manifested this power.</p><p>In practice, manifesting this power grants you a 'precognitive edge.' Normally, you can have only a single precognitive edge at one time. You must use your edge within a period of no more than 10 minutes per level, at which time your preknowledge fades and you lose your edge.</p><p>You can use your precognitive edge in a variety of ways. Essentially, the edge translates into a +2 insight bonus that you can apply at any time to either an attack roll, a damage roll, a saving throw, or a skill check. You can elect to apply the bonus to the roll after you determine that your unmodified roll is lower than desired.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Precognition, Defensive
short_description: Gain +1 insight bonus to AC and saving throws.
description:
<p>Your awareness extends a fraction of a second into the future, allowing you to better evade an opponent's blows.</p>
      <p>You gain a +1 insight bonus to AC and on all saving throws. If caught in a situation where your Dexterity bonus isn't applied to your Armor Class, this bonus to AC and saving throws does not apply.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. For every 3 additional power points you spend, the insight bonus gained increases by 1.</p><p>2. If you spend 6 additional power points, you can manifest this power as a swift action.</p><p/>

name: Precognition, Greater
short_description: Gain +2 insight bonus to one roll.2Clairvoyant Sense: See and hear a distant location.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Precognition, Greater" level="5"><p><h5>Precognition, Greater</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Seer 6<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>10 minutes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 hour/level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>11<br/></td></tr></table><p>As <i>precognition</i>,  except as noted here.</p><p>You gain a +4 insight bonus instead of a +2 bonus.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Precognition, Offensive
short_description: Gain +1 insight bonus on your attack rolls.
description: <p>Your awareness extends a fraction of a second into the future, allowing you to better land blows against your opponent. You gain a +1 insight bonus on your attack rolls.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. For every 3 additional power points you spend, the insight bonus gained on your attack rolls increases by 1.</p><p>2. If you spend 6 additional power points, you can manifest this power as a swift action.</p><p/>

name: Prescience, Offensive
short_description: Gain +2 insight bonus on your damage rolls.
description: <p>Your awareness extends a fraction of a second into the future, allowing you to better aim blows against your opponent. You gain a +2 insight bonus on your damage rolls.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. For every 3 additional power points you spend, the insight bonus gained on your damage rolls increases by 1.</p><p>2. If you spend 6 additional power points, you can manifest this power as a swift action.</p><p/>

name: Prevenom
short_description: Your claws gain a poison coating.
description: <p>If you have a claw attack (either from an actual natural weapon or from an effect such as <i>claws of the beast</i>), you can use this power to produce a mild venom that coats one of your claws. On your next successful melee attack, the venom deals 2 points of Constitution damage. A target struck by the poison can make a Fortitude save (DC 10 + 1/2 your manifester level + your key ability modifier) to negate the damage.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 6 additional power points you spend, this power's Constitution damage increases by 2 points.</p><p/>

name: Prevenom Weapon
short_description: Your weapon is mildly venomous.
description:
<p>As <i>prevenom</i>, except your weapon gains the poison coating as long as it remains in your grip.</p>
      <p/>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 6 additional power points you spend, this power's Constitution damage increases by 2 points.</p><p/>
full_text:
<div topic="Prevenom Weapon" level="5"><p><h5>Prevenom Weapon</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism (Creation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psychic warrior 1<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>Weapon touched<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>1<br/></td></tr></table><p>As <i>prevenom</i>, except your weapon gains the poison coating as long as it remains in your grip.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Prowess
short_description: Instantly gain another attack of opportunity.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Prowess" level="5"><p><h5>Prowess</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psychic warrior 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 immediate action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>3<br/></td></tr></table><p>If an enemy provokes an attack of opportunity from you, you can make the attack even if you've already taken your allotted number of attacks of opportunity this round (usually one).</p><p>You can manifest this power instantly, quickly enough to gain an extra attack of opportunity in the same round. Manifesting this power is an immediate action.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Psionic Blast
short_description: Stun creatures in 30-ft. cone for 1 round.
description: <p>The air ripples with the force of your mental attack, which blasts the minds of all creatures in range. <i>Psionic blast</i> stuns all affected creatures for 1 round.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, the duration of the stun effect increases by 1 round.</p><p/>

name: Psionic Lion's Charge
short_description: You can make full attack in same round you charge.
description:
<p>You gain the powerful charging ability of a lion. When you charge, you can make a full attack in the same round.</p>
      <p>You can manifest this power with an instant thought, quickly enough to gain the benefit of the power as you charge. Manifesting the power is a swift action, like manifesting a quickened power, and it counts toward the normal limit of one quickened power per round. You cannot manifest this power when it isn't your turn.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, each of your attacks after a charge in the current round gains a circumstance bonus on damage equal to the number of additional points spent.</p><p/>

name: Psionic Lock
target: Door, chest, or portal touched, up to 30 sq. ft./level in size
short_description: Secure a door, chest, or portal.
description:
<p>A <i>psionic lock</i> manifested upon a door, chest, or portal psionically locks it. You can freely pass your own lock without affecting it; otherwise, a door or object secured with <i>psionic lock</i> can be opened only by breaking in or by a successful <i>Dispel psionics</i> effect. Add +10 to the normal DC to break open a door or portal affected by this power.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Psionic Lock" level="5"><p><h5>Psionic Lock</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>Door, chest, or portal touched, up to 30 sq. ft./level in size<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Permanent<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>3<br/></td></tr></table><p>A <i>psionic lock</i> manifested upon a door, chest, or portal psionically locks it. You can freely pass your own lock without affecting it; otherwise, a door or object secured with <i>psionic lock</i> can be opened only by breaking in or by a successful <i>Dispel psionics</i> effect. Add +10 to the normal DC to break open a door or portal affected by this power.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Psionic Repair Damage
short_description: Repairs construct of 3d8 hit points +1 hp/level.
description: <p>When laying your hands upon a construct that has at least 1 hit point remaining, you reknit its structure to repair damage it has taken. The power repairs 3d8 points of damage +1 point per manifester level. Constructs that are immune to psionics or magic cannot be repaired in this fashion.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power repairs an additional 1d8 points of damage.</p><p/>

name: Psionic Revivify
short_description: Null
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 100 additional experience points that both you and the subject pay, the manifestation of this power can be delayed by 1 additional round.</p><p/>

name: Psionic Scent
short_description: Gain the scent ability.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Psionic Scent" level="5"><p><h5>Psionic Scent</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psychic warrior 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round/level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>3<br/></td></tr></table><p>You gain an enhanced sense of smell, equivalent to the scent ability of some monsters. This ability allows you to detect approaching enemies, sniff out hidden foes, and track by sense of smell. With the scent ability, you can identify familiar odors just as humanoids do familiar sights.</p><p>You can detect opponents within 30 feet by sense of smell. If the opponent is upwind, the range increases to 60 feet; if downwind, it drops to 15 feet. Strong scents, such as smoke or rotting garbage, can be detected at twice the ranges noted above. Overpowering scents, such as skunk musk or troglodyte stench, can be detected at triple normal range.</p><p>When you detect a scent, the exact location of the source is not revealed-only its presence somewhere within range. You can take a move action to note the direction of the scent. Whenever you come within 5 feet of the source, you pinpoint the source's location.</p><p>If you have the Track feat, you can follow tracks by smell, making a Wisdom (or Survival) check to find or follow a track. The typical DC for a fresh trail is 10 (no matter what kind of surface holds the scent). This DC increases or decreases depending on how strong the quarry's odor is, the number of creatures, and the age of the trail. For each hour that the trail is cold, the DC increases by 2. The ability otherwise follows the rules for the Track feat. If you are tracking with <i>psionic scent</i>,  you ignore the effects of surface conditions and poor visibility.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Psychic Chirurgery
short_description: You repair psychic damage or impart knowledge of new powers.
xp_cost: Each time you use psychic chirurgery to implant knowledge of a power in another creature, you pay an XP cost equal to 1,000 x the level of the power implanted. If you and the subject are both willing to do so, you can split this cost evenly.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Psychic Chirurgery" level="5"><p><h5>Psychic Chirurgery</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Telepath 9<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory, mental, and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>10 minutes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One creature<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>17, XP; see text<br/></td></tr></table><p>You can repair psychic damage or grant another creature knowledge of powers you know, depending on the version of this power you manifest.</p><p><i>Repair Psychic Damage:</i> You can remove any compulsions and charms affecting the subject. In fact, you can remove any instantaneous or permanent effect caused by a psychic power with <i>psychic chirurgery</i>. Unlike with <i>aura alteration</i>, these effects end or are negated as soon as this power is manifested, with no need for another saving throw.</p><p>You can remove all negative levels affecting the subject, regardless of how it lost those levels, restoring it to the highest level it had previously attained. Also, you can restore levels lost to energy drain or a similar effect if the level drain occurred within a number of hours equal to your manifester level.</p><p>You can also remove all psionic effects penalizing the subject's ability scores, heal all ability damage, and remove any ability drain affecting the subject. <i>Psychic chirurgery</i> negates all forms of insanity, confusion, the effect of such powers as <i>microcosm</i>,  and so on, but it does not restore levels or Constitution points lost due to death.</p><p><i>Transfer Knowledge:</i> If desired, you can use this power to directly transfer knowledge of a power you know to another psionic character. You can give a character knowledge of a power of any level that she can manifest, even if the power is not normally on the character's power list. Knowledge of powers gained through <i>psychic chirurgery</i> does not count toward the maximum number of powers a character can know per level.</p><p><i>XP Cost:</i> Each time you use psychic chirurgery to implant knowledge of a power in another creature, you pay an XP cost equal to 1,000 x the level of the power implanted. If you and the subject are both willing to do so, you can split this cost evenly.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Psychic Crush
short_description: Brutally crush subject's mental essence, reducing subject to -1 hit points.
description: <p>Your will abruptly and brutally crushes the mental essence of any one creature, debilitating its acumen. The target must make a Will save with a +4 bonus or collapse unconscious and dying at -1 hit points. If the target succeeds on the save, it takes 3d6 points of damage.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's damage increases by 1d6 points.</p><p/>

name: Psychic Reformation
short_description: Subject can choose skills, feats, and powers anew for previous levels.
xp_cost: This power costs 50 XP to manifest to reformat choices made when the character reached her current level. For each additional previous level into which the revision reaches, the power costs an additional 50 XP. The manifester and subject split all XP costs evenly.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Psychic Reformation" level="5"><p><h5>Psychic Reformation</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory, mental, and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>10 minutes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One creature<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7, XP; see text<br/></td></tr></table><p>When this power is manifested, the subject can choose to spend its most recently gained skill points differently (picking new skills and abandoning old ones if it chooses) and to choose a different feat from the one it selected when advancing from its previous level to its current level.</p><p>The subject can also choose to forget powers it acquired when advancing to its current level, replacing them with new ones.</p><p>The subject can undo decisions of these sorts that were made at lower levels, if both the subject and the manifester agree to pay the necessary XP before this power is manifested (see below). The subject must abide by the standard rules for selecting skills and feats, and so it cannot take feats for which it doesn't qualify or take crossclass skills as class skills.</p><p><i>XP Cost:</i> This power costs 50 XP to manifest to reformat choices made when the character reached her current level. For each additional previous level into which the revision reaches, the power costs an additional 50 XP. The manifester and subject split all XP costs evenly.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Psychic Vampire
short_description: Touch attack drains 2 power points/level from foe.5Psionic RevivifyA X. Return the dead to life before the psyche leaves the corpse.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Psychic Vampire" level="5"><p><h5>Psychic Vampire</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Egoist 4, psychic warrior 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>Creature touched<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Fortitude negates<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>This power shrouds your hand or a natural weapon you possess with darkness that you can use to drain an opponent's power.</p><p>If you manifest this power to affect your hand, the next successful melee touch attack you make (if the victim fails its Fortitude save) drains 2 power points from your foe for every manifester level you have. The drained points simply dissipate. Your touch attack, charged with psionic power, is treated as an armed attack.</p><p>If you manifest this power to affect a natural weapon you possess, you must make a successful melee attack with the weapon to gain the power's benefit.</p><p>Against a psionic being that has no power points or a nonpsionic foe, your attack instead deals 2 points of Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma damage (your choice).</p><p/>
</div>

name: Psychofeedback
short_description: Boost Str, Dex, or Con at the expense of one or more other scores.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Psychofeedback" level="5"><p><h5>Psychofeedback</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Egoist 5, psychic warrior 5<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round/level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>9<br/></td></tr></table><p>You can readjust your body to boost one physical ability score at the expense of one or more other scores. Select one ability score you would like to boost, and increase it by the same amount that you decrease one or more other scores. All score decreases are treated as a special form of ability damage, called ability burn, which cannot be magically or psionically healed-it goes away only through natural healing.</p><p>You can boost your Strength, Dexterity or Constitution score by an amount equal to your manifester level (or any lesser amount), assuming you can afford to burn your other ability scores to such an extent.</p><p>When the duration of this power expires, your ability boost also ends, but your ability burn remains until it is healed naturally.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Quintessence
short_description: You collapse a bit of time into a physical substance.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Quintessence" level="5"><p><h5>Quintessence</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity (Creation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Shaper 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 round<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>0 ft.<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Effect:</b><br/></td><td>1-inch-diameter dollop of quintessence; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>You collapse a bit of time from the continuum, forming a 1-ounce dollop of thick, gooey material called quintessence. This substance shimmers like a silver mirror when viewed from some angles but is transparent from other viewpoints. You can smooth a dollop of quintessence around any extremely small object.</p><p>Objects sealed within quintessence are protected from the effects of time; in practical terms, they enter a state of stasis. Living flesh with only partial contact with quintessence is also partially pulled out of the time stream (the manifester is immune to this effect). This disruption deals 1 point of damage per round beginning 10 rounds after partial contact occurs.</p><p>Quintessence can be manually scraped away from a protected object, freeing it to rejoin the time stream. When you do this, there is a 75% chance that the quintessence evaporates back into the continuum. Otherwise, it coalesces again into a 1-inch-diameter bead, available for later use.</p><p>Large quantities of quintessence could theoretically be gathered to preserve large items or structures (or even a complete living creature; if completely immersed, a living creature would not take the damage associated with partial contact). However, psionic characters and creatures are generally loath to do so because accumulations of quintessence weighing 1 pound or more hinder psionic activity within a 5-foot radius of the accumulation: Powers require twice as many power points to manifest, unless the manifester makes a successful Will save (DC 16) each time he or she attempts to manifest a power. Also in these circumstances, manifesting a psi-like ability that is usable at will is a full-round action rather than a standard action.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Read Thoughts
short_description: Detect surface thoughts of creatures in range.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Read Thoughts" level="5"><p><h5>Read Thoughts</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Telepath 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>60 ft.<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Area:</b><br/></td><td>Cone-shaped emanation centered on you<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Concentration, up to 1 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>3<br/></td></tr></table><p>You know the surface thoughts of the mind of any creature in the area that fails a Will save. A target that succeeds on its save is not affected by this manifestation of the power, even if it leaves the area and then reenters the area before the duration expires.</p><p>Creatures of animal intelligence have simple, instinctual thoughts that you can pick up. If you read the thoughts of a creature with an Intelligence of 26 or higher (and at least 10 points higher than your own Intelligence score), you are stunned for 1 round and the power ends. This power does not let you pinpoint the location of an affected mind if you don't have line of sight to the subject.</p><p>Each round, you can turn to use this power in a new area. The power can penetrate barriers, but 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt blocks it.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Reality Revision
short_description: As bend reality, but fewer limits.
xp_cost: The minimum XP cost for manifesting Reality revision is 5,000
augment: Null

name: Recall Agony
short_description: Foe takes 2d6 damage.
description: <p>The fabric of time parts to your will, revealing wounds your foe has received in the past (or has yet to receive). That foe takes 2d6 points of damage as the past (or future) impinges briefly on the present.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by 1d6 points. For each extra 2d6 points of damage, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Recall Death
short_description: Subject dies or takes 5d6 damage.
description:
<p>As <i>recall agony</i>, except the wounds revealed by folding the fourth dimension are potentially fatal. If the target fails its Will save. it dies. If the save succeeds, the target instead takes 5d6 points of damage.</p>
      <p/>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by 1d6 points. For each extra 2d6 points of damage, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>
full_text:
<div topic="Recall Death" level="5"><p><h5>Recall Death</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience [Death, Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 8<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will partial; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>15<br/></td></tr></table><p>As <i>recall agony</i>, except the wounds revealed by folding the fourth dimension are potentially fatal. If the target fails its Will save. it dies. If the save succeeds, the target instead takes 5d6 points of damage.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Reddopsi
short_description: Null
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Reddopsi" level="5"><p><h5>Reddopsi</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychokinesis<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Kineticist 7<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory, mental, and olfactory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>13<br/></td></tr></table><p>When you manifest <i>reddopsi</i>,  powers targeted against you rebound to affect the original manifester. This effect reverses powers that have only you as a target (except <i>dispel psionics</i> and similar powers or effects). Powers that affect an area and those that produce effects can't be reversed. <i>Reddopsi</i> also can't reverse any power with a range of touch.</p><p>Should you rebound a power back against a manifester who also is protected by <i>reddopsi</i>, the power rebounds once more upon you.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Remote View Trap
short_description: Deal 8d6 points electricity damage to those who seek to view you at a distance.
description:
<p>When others use <i>clairvoyant sense</i>, <i>remote viewing</i>, or other means of scrying you from afar, your prepared trap gives them a nasty surprise. If the scryer fails its saving throw, you are undetected. Moreover, the would-be observer takes 8d6 points of electricity damage. If the scryer makes its saving throw, it takes only 4d6 points of electricity damage and is able to observe you normally. Either way, you are aware of the attempt to view you, but not of the viewer or the viewer's location. It is possible that you might recognize the quasireal viewpoint of someone using the <i>remote viewing</i> power if you could pierce its <i>invisibility</i> (which is true for <i>remote viewing</i> whether or not you use this power).</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Remote View Trap" level="5"><p><h5>Remote View Trap</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience [Electricity]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 6<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>24 hours + 1 hour/level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will half; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>11<br/></td></tr></table><p>When others use <i>clairvoyant sense</i>, <i>remote viewing</i>, or other means of scrying you from afar, your prepared trap gives them a nasty surprise. If the scryer fails its saving throw, you are undetected. Moreover, the would-be observer takes 8d6 points of electricity damage. If the scryer makes its saving throw, it takes only 4d6 points of electricity damage and is able to observe you normally. Either way, you are aware of the attempt to view you, but not of the viewer or the viewer's location. It is possible that you might recognize the quasireal viewpoint of someone using the <i>remote viewing</i> power if you could pierce its <i>invisibility</i> (which is true for <i>remote viewing</i> whether or not you use this power).</p><p/>
</div>

name: Remote Viewing
short_description: See, hear, and potentially interact with subjects at a distance.5Clairtangent Hand: Emulate far hand at a distance.
augment: Null

name: Restoration, Psionic
short_description: Null
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Restoration, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Restoration, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism (Healing)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Egoist 6<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>3 rounds<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>Creature touched<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates (harmless)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes (harmless)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>11<br/></td></tr></table><p>This power cures all ability damage, and it restores all points drained from a single ability score (your choice if more than one score is drained). It also eliminates any fatigue or exhaustion suffered by the target. <i>Restoration</i> does not restore levels or Constitution points lost due to death.</p><p><i>Restoration</i> can remove negative levels. It can also restore one level to a creature who has had a level drained, if the number of days since the creature lost the level is equal to or less than your manifester level. In such a case, <i>Restoration</i> brings the creature up to the minimum number of experience points necessary to advance it to the next higher level, gaining it an additional Hit Die and level benefits accordingly.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Restore Extremity
short_description: Return a lost digit, limb, or other appendage to subject.6Restoration, Psionic: Restores level and ability score drains.7Fission: You briefly duplicate yourself.8Fusion: You combine your abilities and form with another.9Metamorphosis, Greater: Assume shape of any nonunique creature or object each round.
description:
<p>You restore a severed extremity to a creature that has lost a digit, hand, arm, leg, or even its head. This power does not restore life, but it returns a lost extremity to a living or dead creature if the creature is otherwise mostly intact. The original extremity need not be present when this power is manifested; a new extremity is created by the power. If a head is restored to a body, the original head (if not already destroyed) loses all spark of identity, and can be considered so much dead tissue.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Restore Extremity" level="5"><p><h5>Restore Extremity</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism (Healing)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Egoist 5<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>Creature touched<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will half (harmless)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes (harmless)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>9<br/></td></tr></table><p>You restore a severed extremity to a creature that has lost a digit, hand, arm, leg, or even its head. This power does not restore life, but it returns a lost extremity to a living or dead creature if the creature is otherwise mostly intact. The original extremity need not be present when this power is manifested; a new extremity is created by the power. If a head is restored to a body, the original head (if not already destroyed) loses all spark of identity, and can be considered so much dead tissue.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Retrieve
target: One object you can hold or carry in one hand, weighing up to 10 lb./level
short_description: Teleport to your hand an item you can see.
description: <p>You automatically teleport an item you can see within range directly to your hand. If the object is in the possession of an opponent, it comes to your hand if your opponent fails a Will save.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, the weight limit of the target increases by 10 pounds.</p><p/>

name: Schism
short_description: Your partitioned mind can manifest lower level powers.5Metaconcert: Mental concert of two or more increases the total power of the participants.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Schism" level="5"><p><h5>Schism</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Telepath 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round/level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>Your mind splits into two independent parts. Each part functions in complete autonomy, like two characters in one body. Your new 'second mind' does not control your body physically but is free to take one standard action in each round if the action is purely mental (such as manifesting a power) in the same round you take your normal actions.</p><p>Your second mind can manifest powers using your power point reserve, but only as if your manifester level were six lower than it is. Your second mind doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity when manifesting a power, because doing so doesn't distract your primary mind.</p><p>Your second mind takes its first action on your turn in the round after <i>schism</i> is manifested.</p><p>Both your minds communicate with each other telepathically. If you are subject to a compulsion or charm effect while you are of two minds, make a second saving throw if you fail the first. If you fail both, then the <i>schism</i> ends and you are affected normally by the power. If you fail just one, the <i>schism</i> ends immediately, but you are not subject to the compulsion or charm.</p><p>Your second mind does not gain any advantages if you are subject to a <i>haste</i> effect, although you gain the overall standard benefits.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Second Chance
short_description: Gain a reroll.6Precognition, Greater: Gain +4 insight bonus to one roll.7Fate of One: Reroll any roll you just failed.8Hypercognition: You can deduce almost anything.9Metafaculty: You learn details about any one creature.
description:
<p>You take a hand in influencing the probable outcomes of your immediate environment. You see the many alternative branches that reality could take in the next few seconds, and with this foreknowledge you gain the ability to reroll one attack roll, one saving throw, one ability check, or one skill check each round. You must take the result of the reroll, even if it's worse than the original roll. You do not have to make another roll if satisfied with your original roll.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Second Chance" level="5"><p><h5>Second Chance</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Seer 5<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round/level or until discharged<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>9<br/></td></tr></table><p>You take a hand in influencing the probable outcomes of your immediate environment. You see the many alternative branches that reality could take in the next few seconds, and with this foreknowledge you gain the ability to reroll one attack roll, one saving throw, one ability check, or one skill check each round. You must take the result of the reroll, even if it's worse than the original roll. You do not have to make another roll if satisfied with your original roll.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Sense Link
short_description: You sense what the subject senses (single sense).
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. If you spend 2 additional power points, you can have the subject perceive one of your senses instead of the other way around.</p><p>2. If you spend 4 additional power points, you can link to a second sense of the same subject.</p><p/>

name: Sense Link, Forced
short_description: Sense what subject senses.
description:
<p>As <i>sense link</i>,  except you can use this power on any creature (willing or unwilling), and this power can't be augmented.</p>
      <p/>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. If you spend 2 additional power points, you can have the subject perceive one of your senses instead of the other way around.</p><p>2. If you spend 4 additional power points, you can link to a second sense of the same subject.</p><p/>
full_text:
<div topic="Sense Link, Forced" level="5"><p><h5>Sense Link, Forced</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>3<br/></td></tr></table><p>As <i>sense link</i>,  except you can use this power on any creature (willing or unwilling), and this power can't be augmented.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Sensitivity to Psychic Impressions
area: Spread with a radius of 25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels, centered on you
short_description: You can find out about an area's past.3Escape Detection: You become difficult to detect with clairsentience powers.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Sensitivity to Psychic Impressions" level="5"><p><h5>Sensitivity to Psychic Impressions</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Seer 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory and material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 hour<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Area:</b><br/></td><td>Spread with a radius of 25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels, centered on you<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Concentration, up to 10 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>3<br/></td></tr></table><p>You gain historical vision in a given location. Rooms, streets, tunnels, and other discrete locations accumulate psychic impressions left by powerful emotions experienced in a given area. These impressions offer you a picture of the location's past.</p><p>The types of events most likely to leave psychic impressions are those that elicited strong emotions: battles and betrayals, marriages and murders, births and great pain, or any other event where one emotion dominates. Everyday occurrences leave no residue for a manifester to detect.</p><p>The vision of the event is dreamlike and shadowy. You do not gain special knowledge of those involved in the vision, though you might be able to read large banners or other writing if they are in your language.</p><p>Beginning with the most recent significant event at a location and working backward in time, you can sense one distinct event for every 10 minutes you maintain concentration, if any such events exist to be sensed. Your sensitivity extends into the past a maximum number of years equal to 100 x your manifester level.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Sequester, Psionic
target: One willing creature or one object (up to a 2-ft. cube/level) touched
short_description: Subject invisible to sight and remote viewing; renders subject comatose.
description:
<p>As the <i>sequester</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Sequester, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Sequester, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 7<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One willing creature or one object (up to a 2-ft. cube/level) touched<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>One day/level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None or Will negates (object)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No or Yes (object)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>13, XP<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>sequester</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p><i>XP Cost:</i> 75 XP.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Shadow Body
short_description: You become a living shadow (not the creature).
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Shadow Body" level="5"><p><h5>Shadow Body</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 8<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Auditory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>15<br/></td></tr></table><p>Your body and all your equipment are subsumed by your shadow. As a living shadow, you blend perfectly into any other shadow and vanish in darkness. You appear as an unattached shadow in areas of full light.</p><p>You can move at your normal speed, on any surface, including walls and ceilings, as well as across the surfaces of liquids-even up the face of a waterfall.</p><p>Your space does not change, so you cannot move into locations you would not normally be able to move into.</p><p>While in your <i>shadow body</i>,  you gain damage reduction 10/magic and darkvision out to 60 feet. You are immune to extra damage from critical hits, ability damage, disease, drowning, and poison. You take only half damage from acid, electricity, and fire of all kinds.</p><p>While affected by this power, you can be detected by powers that read thoughts, life, or presences (including <i>true seeing</i>), or if you make suspicious movements in lighted areas.</p><p>You cannot harm anyone physically or manipulate any objects, but you can use your powers normally. Doing so may attract notice, but if you remain in a shadowed area, you get a +15 bonus on your Hide check to remain unnoticed.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Share Pain
target: You and one willing creature, or two willing creatures; see text
short_description: Willing subject takes some of your damage.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Share Pain" level="5"><p><h5>Share Pain</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material and mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Targets:</b><br/></td><td>You and one willing creature, or two willing creatures; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 hour/level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>3<br/></td></tr></table><p>This power creates a psychometabolic connection between you and a willing subject so that some of your wounds are transferred to the subject. You take half damage from all attacks that deal hit point damage to you, and the subject takes the remainder. The amount of damage not taken by you is taken by the subject. If your hit points are reduced by a lowered Constitution score, that reduction is not shared with the subject because it is not a form of hit point damage. When this power ends, subsequent damage is no longer divided between the subject and you, but damage already shared is not reassigned.</p><p>If you and the subject move farther away from each other than close range, the power ends.</p><p>You can manifest this power on two willing subjects, one of which you designate to share its damage with the other.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Share Pain, Forced
short_description: Unwilling subject takes some of your damage.
description:
<p>As <i>share pain</i>, except as noted here.</p>
      <p>You attempt to force the sharing of your wounds with an unwilling creature, and for less time. If you are immune to the type of damage dealt, or if you convert lethal damage into nonlethal damage, the target takes no damage.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Shatter Mind Blank
short_description: Cancels target's mind blank effect.
description:
<p>This power can negate a <i>psionic mind blank</i> or a <i>personal mind blank</i> affecting the target. If the target fails its save and does not overcome your attempt with its power resistance, you can shatter the mind blank by making a successful check (1d20 + your manifester level, maximum +20) against a DC equal to 11 + the manifester level of the creator of the <i>mind blank</i> effect. If you succeed, the <i>psionic mind blank</i> or <i>personal mind blank</i> ends, allowing you to affect the target thereafter with mind-affecting powers.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Shatter Mind Blank" level="5"><p><h5>Shatter Mind Blank</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 5<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Olfactory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>30 ft.<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Area:</b><br/></td><td>30-ft. -radius burst centered on you<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>9<br/></td></tr></table><p>This power can negate a <i>psionic mind blank</i> or a <i>personal mind blank</i> affecting the target. If the target fails its save and does not overcome your attempt with its power resistance, you can shatter the mind blank by making a successful check (1d20 + your manifester level, maximum +20) against a DC equal to 11 + the manifester level of the creator of the <i>mind blank</i> effect. If you succeed, the <i>psionic mind blank</i> or <i>personal mind blank</i> ends, allowing you to affect the target thereafter with mind-affecting powers.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Skate
target: You or one willing creature or one unattended object (total weight up to 100 lb./level); see text
short_description: Subject slides skillfully along the ground.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Skate" level="5"><p><h5>Skate</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 1, psychic warrior 1<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal or touch; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You or one willing creature or one unattended object (total weight up to 100 lb./level); see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes (harmless, object)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>1<br/></td></tr></table><p>You, another willing creature, or an unattended object can slide along solid ground as if on smooth ice. If you manifest <i>skate</i> on yourself or another creature, the subject of the power retains equilibrium by mental desire alone, allowing her to gracefully skate along the ground, turn, or stop suddenly as desired. The skater's land speed increases by 15 feet. (This adjustment is treated as an enhancement bonus.) As with any effect that increases speed, this power affects the subject's maximum jumping distance.</p><p>The subject can skate up or down any incline or decline she could normally walk upon without mishap, though skating up an incline reduces the subject's speed to normal, while skating down a decline increases her speed by an additional 15 feet. (This adjustment is treated as a circumstance bonus.)</p><p>If you manifest <i>skate</i> on an object, treat the object as having only one-tenth of its normal weight for the purpose of dragging it along the ground.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Solicit Psicrystal
short_description: Your psicrystal takes over your concentration power.
description:
<p>Your psicrystal takes over the responsibility of maintaining concentration on any single power you have manifested and are concentrating on. While maintaining this concentration, the psicrystal is limited to move actions in each round, as normal. When the duration of <i>solicit psicrystal</i> expires, the power you transferred to the psicrystal ends (even if this would mean that the power ends earlier than normal). If necessary, the psicrystal makes Concentration checks using your Concentration modifier.</p>
      <p>You can manifest this power (and transfer the responsibility) with an instant thought, quickly enough to gain the benefit of the power before you take any other actions in a round. Manifesting the power is a swift action, like manifesting a quickened power, and it counts toward the normal limit of one quickened power per round. You cannot manifest this power when it isn't your turn.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's maximum duration increases by 1 round.</p><p/>

name: Steadfast Perception
short_description: Gain immunity to illusory effects, +6 bonus on Spot and Search checks.
description:
<p>Your vision cannot be distracted or misled, granting you immunity to all figments and glamers (such as <i>invisibility</i>). Moreover, your Spot and Search checks receive a +6 enhancement bonus for the duration of this power. This power also grants you another saving throw against someone using <i>false sensory input</i> on you, but you must realize that that power has been used in order to know enough to manifest <i>steadfast perception</i>.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Steadfast Perception" level="5"><p><h5>Steadfast Perception</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psychic warrior 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>Your vision cannot be distracted or misled, granting you immunity to all figments and glamers (such as <i>invisibility</i>). Moreover, your Spot and Search checks receive a +6 enhancement bonus for the duration of this power. This power also grants you another saving throw against someone using <i>false sensory input</i> on you, but you must realize that that power has been used in order to know enough to manifest <i>steadfast perception</i>.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Stomp
short_description: Subjects fall prone and take 1d4 nonlethal damage.
description: <p>Your foot stomp precipitates a psychokinetic shock wave that travels along the ground, toppling creatures and loose objects. The shock wave affects only creatures standing on the ground within the power's area. Creatures that fail their saves are thrown to the ground, become prone, and take 1d4 points of nonlethal damage.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's nonlethal damage increases by 1d4 points.</p><p/>

name: Strength of My Enemy
short_description: Siphon away your enemy's strength and grow stronger.
description: <p>You gain the ability to siphon away your enemy's strength for your own use. One of your natural or manufactured weapons becomes the instrument of your desire, and deals 1 point of Strength damage on each successful hit. You gain that point of Strength as an enhancement bonus to your Strength score. Strength you siphon from different foes is tracked separately-the total siphoned from each individual foe is considered a separate enhancement bonus to your Strength (maximum +8), and you gain only the highest total.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. For every 3 additional power points you spend, the maximum enhancement bonus you can add to your Strength increases by 2.</p><p>2. If you spend 6 additional power points, you can manifest this power as a swift action.</p><p/>

name: Suggestion, Psionic
short_description: Compels subject to follow stated course of action.
description: <p>As the <i>suggestion</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power can affect an additional target. Any additional target cannot be more than 15 feet from another target of the power.</p><p/>

name: Suspend Life
duration: Permanent unless ended or dismissed; see text
short_description: Put yourself into a state akin to suspended animation.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Suspend Life" level="5"><p><h5>Suspend Life</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 6, psychic warrior 6<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Olfactory<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Permanent unless ended or dismissed; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>11<br/></td></tr></table><p>You can place yourself into a trance so deep that you are almost in suspended animation. Even powers that detect life or thought are incapable of determining that you are alive.</p><p>While you are suspended, you are aware of your surroundings. You feel the passage of one day for every year that actually passes. Though on a slower schedule, you grow hungry after a 'day' without food (though a year passes in actuality) and begin to suffer the effects of thirst and starvation as appropriate.</p><p>If you take any damage, you come out of your trance 4 rounds later. The trance can also be ended by a successful use of <i>dispel psionics</i>. If you choose to dismiss the power, your trance ends 10 rounds later.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Sustenance
short_description: You can go without food and water for one day.
description:
<p>You can go without food and water for one day. Each time you manifest this power, your body manufactures suffi- cient solid and liquid nourishment to satisfy your needs for that time.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Sustenance" level="5"><p><h5>Sustenance</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 2, psychic warrior 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>3<br/></td></tr></table><p>You can go without food and water for one day. Each time you manifest this power, your body manufactures suffi- cient solid and liquid nourishment to satisfy your needs for that time.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Swarm of Crystals
short_description: Crystal shards are sprayed forth doing 3d4 slashing damage.
description: <p>Thousands of tiny crystal shards spray forth in an arc from your hand. These razorlike crystals slice everything in their path. Anyone caught in the cone takes 3d4 points of slashing damage.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by 1d4 points.</p><p/>

name: Synesthete
short_description: You receive one kind of sense when another sense is stimulated.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Synesthete" level="5"><p><h5>Synesthete</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 1, psychic warrior 1<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>1<br/></td></tr></table><p>You receive one kind of sensory input when a different sense is stimulated. In particular, you can either feel light or feel sound. You can shift your stimulated sense between these two options once per round as a swift action. Your senses continue to work normally as well, unless they are impaired for some reason.</p><p>Your face must be uncovered to use this power, because it is the skin of your face that acts as the sensory receiver.</p><p>If you are feeling light by absorbing ambient light onto your skin, you have your normal visual abilities (except for darkvision), even if your eyes are closed or you are blinded. If your eyes are working normally, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus on all Spot and Search checks. While feeling light, you are immune to gaze attacks.</p><p>If you are feeling sound by absorbing sound onto your skin and your ears are working normally, the expanded audio input provides you with a +4 circumstance bonus on Listen checks.</p><p>Psionic or magical displacement effects, invisibility effects, illusions, and other similar effects confuse your <i>synesthete</i> senses just as they would your normal senses.</p><p>You can also use this power to see sound if you are deafened, or hear light if you are blinded, thus removing all penalties associated with either condition (though you gain no bonuses for using the power in this way if you are not deafened or blinded).</p><p/>
</div>

name: Telekinetic Force
short_description: Move an object with the sustained force of your mind.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, the weight limit of the target increases by 25 pounds.</p><p/>

name: Telekinetic Maneuver
short_description: Telekinetically bull rush, disarm, grapple, or trip your target.
description: <p>You can affect a foe by concentrating your mind upon its current status and the status you desire, once per round. You can perform a bull rush, a disarm, a grapple (including a pin), or a trip. Resolve these attempts as normal, except that they don't provoke attacks of opportunity, you use your manifester level in place of your base attack bonus (for disarm and grapple attempts), you use your Intelligence modifier in place of your Strength modifier or Dexterity modifier, and a failed attempt doesn't allow a reactive attempt by the target (such as normally allowed on disarm or trip attempts). No save is allowed against these attempts, but power resistance applies normally.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power grants a +1 bonus on your checks involving bull rush, disarm, grapple, or trip attempts.</p><p/>

name: Telekinetic Sphere, Psionic
effect: 1-ft. -diameter/level sphere, centered around creatures or objects
short_description: Null
description:
<p>As the <i>telekinetic sphere</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Telekinetic Sphere, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Telekinetic Sphere, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychokinesis [Force]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Kineticist 8<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Effect:</b><br/></td><td>1-ft. -diameter/level sphere, centered around creatures or objects<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Reflex negates (object)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes (object)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>15<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>telekinetic sphere</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Telekinetic Thrust
target: One or more objects or creatures with a total weight of 250 lb. or less
saving_throw: Will negates or Will negates (object); see text
short_description: Hurl objects with the force of your mind.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, the weight limit of the target or targets increases by 25 pounds.</p><p/>

name: Telempathic Projection
short_description: Alter the subject's mood.
description:
<p>You alter the subject's mood, adjusting its attitude toward you by one step in a positive direction. For instance, an unfriendly creature can be made indifferent, or a hostile creature unfriendly. You can grant a +4 bonus on your own (or others') Bluff, Diplomacy, Intimidate, Perform, or Sense Motive checks involving the affected creature.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
