<div topic="Telempathic Projection" level="5"><p><h5>Telempathic Projection</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy (Charm) [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 1<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One creature<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Will negates<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>1<br/></td></tr></table><p>You alter the subject's mood, adjusting its attitude toward you by one step in a positive direction. For instance, an unfriendly creature can be made indifferent, or a hostile creature unfriendly. You can grant a +4 bonus on your own (or others') Bluff, Diplomacy, Intimidate, Perform, or Sense Motive checks involving the affected creature.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Teleport, Psionic
target: You and touched objects or other touched willing creatures
short_description: Instantly transports you as far as 100 miles/level.
description:
<p>As the <i>teleport</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Teleport, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Teleport, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation (Teleportation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Nomad 5<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal and touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target or Targets:</b><br/></td><td>You and touched objects or other touched willing creatures<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None or Will negates (object)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No or Yes (object)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>9<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>teleport</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Teleport, Psionic Greater
short_description: As psionic teleport, but no range limit and no off-target arrival.
description:
<p>As the <i>greater teleport</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Teleport, Psionic Greater" level="5"><p><h5>Teleport, Psionic Greater</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation (Teleportation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 8<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>15<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>greater teleport</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Teleportation Circle, Psionic
effect: 5-ft. -radius circle that teleports those who activate it
short_description: Null
description:
<p>As the <i>teleportation circle</i> spell, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Teleportation Circle, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Teleportation Circle, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation (Teleportation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Nomad 9<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Mental<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>10 minutes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>0 ft.<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Effect:</b><br/></td><td>5-ft. -radius circle that teleports those who activate it<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>Yes<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>17<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>teleportation circle</i> spell, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Teleport Trigger
short_description: Predetermined event triggers teleport.6Banishment, Psionic: Banishes extraplanar creatures.7Dream Travel: Travel to other places through dreams.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Teleport Trigger" level="5"><p><h5>Teleport Trigger</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation (Teleportation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Nomad 5<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 hour/level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>9<br/></td></tr></table><p>You specify a situation that triggers your automatic manifestation of a <i>psionic teleport</i>,  taking you to a predetermined location. You must know the <i>psionic teleport</i> power and have sufficient power points to manifest it when the specified situation occurs.</p><p>The <i>teleport trigger</i> goes off on the initiative count immediately after the specified situation occurs, even if you are flat-footed or you have already taken your turn in the current round. The specified situation can be described in general terms or specific terms.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Temporal Acceleration
short_description: Your time frame accelerates for 1 round.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 4 additional power points you spend, this power's duration (in apparent time) increases by 1 round.</p><p/>

name: Thicken Skin
short_description: Gain +1 enhancement bonus to your AC for 10 min./level.
description: <p>Your skin or natural armor thickens and spreads across your body, providing a +1 enhancement bonus to your Armor Class.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. For every 3 additional power points you spend, the enhancement bonus increases by 1.</p><p>2. If you spend 6 additional power points, you can manifest this power as a swift action.</p><p/>

name: Thought Shield
short_description: Gain PR 13 against mind-affecting powers.
description:
<p>You fortify your mind against intrusions, gaining power resistance 13 against all mind-affecting powers.</p>
      <p>You can manifest this power instantly, quickly enough to gain its benefits in an emergency. Manifesting the power is an immediate action. You can use this power even when it's not your turn.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's duration increases by 1 round, and the power resistance it provides increases by 1 point.</p><p/>

name: Time Hop
target: One Medium or smaller creature, or one object weighing 300 lb. or less
short_description: Subject hops forward in time 1 round/level.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> You can augment this power in one or both of the following ways.</p><p>1. For every 2 additional power points you spend, you can affect a creature of one size category larger, or double the weight of an object to be affected.</p><p>2. For every 2 additional power points you spend, this power can affect an additional target. Any additional target cannot be more than 15 feet from another target of the power.</p><p/>

name: Time Hop, Mass
short_description: Subject hops forward in time 1 round/level.
description: <p>As <i>time hop</i>, except you can affect any number of willing subjects in range, including yourself. You can choose which creatures are affected by the power. The subjects hop forward in time a number of hours equal to your manifester level, or some shorter number of hours; you decide how many hours the <i>mass time hop</i> lasts when you manifest the power.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> If you spend 6 additional power points, you can manifest this power as an immediate action.</p><p/>

name: Time Regression
short_description: Null
description:
<p>You can regress apparent time 1 round into the past. In effect, you 'replay' the previous round of activity. The power regresses time to the point along the time stream just prior to your previous turn, undoing the effects of everyone else's actions in the meantime. Once you have used <i>time regression</i>,  only you retain knowledge of what happened during the round that is being replayed; however, you can communicate that knowledge verbally to your companions, if desired. During the round that you live through a second time, you can act on knowledge you previously gained by already living through the immediate future. In all likelihood, you'll probably not choose to manifest <i>time regression</i> during your second pass through the time stream, instead taking completely new actions, but you pay the XP cost all the same.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null

In effect, you 'replay' the previous round of activity. The power regresses time to the point along the time stream just prior to your previous turn, undoing the effects of everyone else's actions in the meantime. Once you have used <i>time regression</i>,  only you retain knowledge of what happened during the round that is being replayed; however, you can communicate that knowledge verbally to your companions, if desired. During the round that you live through a second time, you can act on knowledge you previously gained by already living through the immediate future. In all likelihood, you'll probably not choose to manifest <i>time regression</i> during your second pass through the time stream, instead taking completely new actions, but you pay the XP cost all the same.</p><p><i>XP Cost:</i> 1,000 XP.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Timeless Body
short_description: Ignore all harmful, and helpful, effects for 1 round.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Timeless Body" level="5"><p><h5>Timeless Body</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 9<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>17<br/></td></tr></table><p>Your body ignores all harmful (and helpful) effects, beginning when you finish manifesting this power and ending at the end of your next turn. While <i>timeless body</i> is in effect, you are invulnerable to all attacks and powers.</p><p>This power cannot be quickened.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Tongues, Psionic
short_description: You can communicate with intelligent creatures.
description:
<p>As the <i>tongues</i> spell, except as noted here. This power does not enable you to speak with creatures immune to mind-affecting powers.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Tongues, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>Tongues, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Telepathy [Mind-Affecting]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>3<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>tongues</i> spell, except as noted here. This power does not enable you to speak with creatures immune to mind-affecting powers.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Tornado Blast
short_description: Null
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's area damage (not the damage from direct contact dealt to a specific creature) increases by 1d6 points (to a maximum of 24d6 points). For each extra 2d6 points of damage, this power's save DC increases by 1.</p><p/>

name: Touchsight
short_description: Your telekinetic field tells you where everything is.
description: <p>You generate a subtle telekinetic field of mental contact, allowing you to 'feel' your surroundings even in total darkness or when your sight would otherwise be obscured by your physical environment. Your <i>touchsight</i> field emanates from you out to 60 feet. You ignore invisibility, darkness, and concealment, though you must have line of effect to a creature or an object to discern it. You do not need to make Spot or Listen checks to notice creatures; you can detect and pinpoint all creatures within 60 feet. In many circumstances, comparing your regular senses to what you learn with <i>touchsight</i> is enough to tell you the difference between visible, invisible, hiding, and concealed creatures.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every 2 additional power points you spend, the radius of your <i>touchsight</i> field increases by 10 feet.</p><p/>

name: Tower of Iron Will
short_description: Grant PR 19 against mind-affecting powers to all creatures within 10 ft. until your next turn.
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's duration increases by 1 round and the power resistance it provides increases by 1 point.</p><p/>

name: Trace Teleport
area: Spread with a radius of 25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels, centered on you
short_description: Learn destination of subject's teleport.
description:
<p>As <i>detect teleportation</i>, except you can trace the destination of any psionic or magical teleportation made by others within this power's area within the last minute.</p>
      <p>You know the direction and distance the individuals traveled and could teleport to the location yourself if you so desired (and if you know the <i>psionic teleport</i> power), as if you had 'seen casually' the location. This power does not grant you any information on the conditions at the other end of the trace beyond the mental coordinates of the location.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> If you spend 2 additional power points, this power's range increases to Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level).</p><p/>

name: True Creation
short_description: As psionic major creation, except items are completely real.
xp_cost: 1/5 of the item's gold piece value, or a minimum of 1 XP.
description:
<p>As <i>psionic major creation</i>, except items created are enduring and cannot be negated by dispelling magic or negating powers. For all intents and purposes, these items are completely real.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="True Creation" level="5"><p><h5>True Creation</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity (Creation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Shaper 9<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>Instantaneous<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>17, XP<br/></td></tr></table><p>As <i>psionic major creation</i>, except items created are enduring and cannot be negated by dispelling magic or negating powers. For all intents and purposes, these items are completely real.</p><p><i>XP Cost:</i> 1/5 of the item's gold piece value, or a minimum of 1 XP.</p><p/>
</div>

name: True Metabolism
short_description: You regenerate 10 hit points/round.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="True Metabolism" level="5"><p><h5>True Metabolism</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 8<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 round<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>15<br/></td></tr></table><p>You are difficult to kill while this power persists. You automatically heal damage at the rate of 10 hit points per round.</p><p>This power is not effective against damage from starvation, thirst, or suffocation. Also, attack forms that don't deal hit point damage (for example, most poisons) ignore <i>true metabolism</i>. You can also use this power to regrow lost portions of your body and to reattach severed limbs or body parts, if you do nothing but concentrate on regrowing the lost body part or reattaching the severed limb for the duration of the power. You do not gain the benefits described earlier when you manifest <i>true metabolism</i> for this purpose. You must have a Constitution score to gain any of this power's benefits.</p><p/>
</div>

name: True Seeing, Psionic
short_description: See all things as they really are.
description:
<p>As the <i>true seeing</i> power, except as noted here.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="True Seeing, Psionic" level="5"><p><h5>True Seeing, Psionic</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 5<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>9<br/></td></tr></table><p>As the <i>true seeing</i> power, except as noted here.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Truevenom
saving_throw: None and Fortitude negates; see text
short_description: Your natural weapons are covered in horrible poison.
description:
<p>If you have a claw attack (either from an actual natural weapon or from an effect such as <i>claws of the beast</i>), you can use this power to produce a horrible poison that coats one of your claws. On your next successful melee attack with the claw during the power's duration, the poison deals 1d8 points of Constitution damage immediately and another 1d8 points of Constitution damage 1 minute later. The target of your attack can negate each instance of damage with a Fortitude save.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Truevenom" level="5"><p><h5>Truevenom</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psychic warrior 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 swift action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level or until discharged<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None and Fortitude negates; see text<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>If you have a claw attack (either from an actual natural weapon or from an effect such as <i>claws of the beast</i>), you can use this power to produce a horrible poison that coats one of your claws. On your next successful melee attack with the claw during the power's duration, the poison deals 1d8 points of Constitution damage immediately and another 1d8 points of Constitution damage 1 minute later. The target of your attack can negate each instance of damage with a Fortitude save.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Truevenom Weapon
saving_throw: None and Fortitude negates; see text
short_description: Your weapon is horribly poisonous.
description:
<p>As <i>truevenom</i>, except your weapon gains the poison coating as long as it remains in your grip, until the effect is discharged, or until the duration expires, whichever occurs first.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Truevenom Weapon" level="5"><p><h5>Truevenom Weapon</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism (Creation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psychic warrior 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>Weapon touched<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>As <i>truevenom</i>, except your weapon gains the poison coating as long as it remains in your grip, until the effect is discharged, or until the duration expires, whichever occurs first.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Ubiquitous Vision
short_description: You have all-around vision.
description:
<p>You have metaphoric 'eyes in the back of your head,' and on the sides and top as well, granting you benefits in specific situations. In effect, you have a 360-degree sphere of sight, allowing you a perfect view of creatures that might otherwise flank you. Thus, flanking opponents gain no bonus on their attack rolls, and rogues are denied their sneak attack ability because you do not lose your Dexterity bonus (but they may still sneak attack you if you are caught flat-footed). Your Spot and Search checks gain a +4 enhancement bonus. Concurrently, you take a -4 penalty on saves against all gaze attacks during the power's duration.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Ubiquitous Vision" level="5"><p><h5>Ubiquitous Vision</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Clairsentience<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 3, psychic warrior 3<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>10 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>5<br/></td></tr></table><p>You have metaphoric 'eyes in the back of your head,' and on the sides and top as well, granting you benefits in specific situations. In effect, you have a 360-degree sphere of sight, allowing you a perfect view of creatures that might otherwise flank you. Thus, flanking opponents gain no bonus on their attack rolls, and rogues are denied their sneak attack ability because you do not lose your Dexterity bonus (but they may still sneak attack you if you are caught flat-footed). Your Spot and Search checks gain a +4 enhancement bonus. Concurrently, you take a -4 penalty on saves against all gaze attacks during the power's duration.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Ultrablast
short_description: Deal 13d6 damage in 15-ft. radius.
description: <p>You 'grumble' psychically (which both psionic and nonpsionic creatures can detect), then release a horrid shriek from your subconscious that disrupts the brains of all enemies in the power's area, dealing 13d6 points of damage to each enemy.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, this power's damage increases by 1d6 points.</p><p/>

name: Vampiric Blade
short_description: You heal half of your base weapon damage.
description:
<p>As <i>claws of the vampire</i>, except your weapon is affected as long as it remains in your grip or until this power's duration expires.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Vampiric Blade" level="5"><p><h5>Vampiric Blade</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychometabolism<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psychic warrior 3<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material and visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>0 ft.<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>One weapon you hold<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round/level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>5<br/></td></tr></table><p>As <i>claws of the vampire</i>, except your weapon is affected as long as it remains in your grip or until this power's duration expires.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Vigor
short_description: Gain 5 temporary hit points.
description: <p>You suffuse yourself with power, gaining 5 temporary hit points. Using this power again when an earlier manifestation has not expired merely replaces the older temporary hit points (if any remain) with the newer ones.</p>
augment: <p><b>Augment:</b> For every additional power point you spend, the number of temporary hit points you gain increases by 5.</p><p/>

name: Wall of Ectoplasm
effect: Wall whose area is up to one 10-ft. square/level or a sphere or hemisphere with a radius of up to 1 ft./level
short_description: You create a protective barrier.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Wall of Ectoplasm" level="5"><p><h5>Wall of Ectoplasm</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Metacreativity (Creation)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psion/wilder 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Effect:</b><br/></td><td>Wall whose area is up to one 10-ft. square/level or a sphere or hemisphere with a radius of up to 1 ft./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level (D)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>No<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>You fashion a roiling wall of ectoplasm, imbuing it with solidity. The wall cannot move once it is formed. It is 1 inch thick per four manifester levels and occupies up to one 10-foot square per level. Each 10-foot square of the wall has 10 hit points per inch of thickness and hardness 5. A section of the wall whose hit points drop to 0 is breached. If a creature tries to break through the wall, the DC for the Strength check is 15 + 2 per inch of thickness.</p><p>The <i>wall of ectoplasm</i> is susceptible to <i>dispel psionics</i>, but it gains a +4 bonus on any check to determine whether the wall is negated. Spells, powers, and breath weapons cannot pass through the wall in either direction (though they could damage it). It blocks ethereal creatures as well as material creatures (though ethereal creatures can usually get around the wall by floating under or over it through material floors and ceilings). The wall is opaque, so neither vision nor gaze attacks operate through it. The wall does not block psychoportive travel, such as that provided by the <i>psionic teleport</i> power.</p><p>You can form the wall into a flat, vertical plane whose area is up to one 10-foot square per level or into a sphere or hemisphere with a radius of up to 1 foot per level.</p><p>The <i>wall of ectoplasm</i> must be continuous and unbroken when manifested. If its surface is interrupted by any object or creature, the power fails.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Wall Walker
short_description: Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings.
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Wall Walker" level="5"><p><h5>Wall Walker</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychoportation<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psychic warrior 2<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Material<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Manifesting Time:</b><br/></td><td>1 standard action<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Personal<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>You<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 min./level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>3<br/></td></tr></table><p>You can walk on vertical surfaces or even traverse ceilings (you need not make Climb checks to traverse these surfaces). Because of the need to keep at least one foot in contact with the wall or ceiling at all times, you cannot jump or use the run action, and you can move at only half speed.</p><p>You retain your Dexterity bonus to Armor Class, if any, and opponents gain no special bonuses against you.</p><p/>
</div>

name: Weapon of Energy
short_description: Weapon deals additional energy damage.
description:
<p>As <i>claw of energy</i>,  except this power can be manifested on a touched weapon. This power's subtype is the same as the type of energy infused in the touched weapon.</p>
      <p/>
augment: Null
full_text:
<div topic="Weapon of Energy" level="5"><p><h5>Weapon of Energy</h5></p><table width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" frame="VOID" rules="ROWS"><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"/><td>Psychokinesis [see text]<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Level:</b><br/></td><td>Psychic warrior 4<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Display:</b><br/></td><td>Visual<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Range:</b><br/></td><td>Touch<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Target:</b><br/></td><td>Weapon touched<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Duration:</b><br/></td><td>1 round/level<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Saving Throw:</b><br/></td><td>Fortitude negates (object, harmless)<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Resistance:</b><br/></td><td>None<br/></td></tr><tr maxcol="3" curcol="3"><td width="25%"><b>Power Points:</b><br/></td><td>7<br/></td></tr></table><p>As <i>claw of energy</i>,  except this power can be manifested on a touched weapon. This power's subtype is the same as the type of energy infused in the touched weapon.</p><p/>
</div>
